vicitrārthā mahodārā giraḥ śrutāḥ  atha tūṣṇīṃ sthitavati rāme rājīvalocane  tasminraghukulākāśaśaśāṅke śaśisundare  sādhuvādagirā sārdhaṃ siddhasārthasamīritā  vitānakasamā vyomnaḥ pauṣpī vṛṣṭiḥ papāta ha  mandārakośaviśrāntabhramaradvandvanādinī  madhurāmodasaundaryamuditonmadamānavā  vyomavātavinunneva tārakāṇāṃ paramparā  patiteva dharāpīṭhe svargastrīhasitacchaṭā  vṛṣyamūkakacanmeghalavāvaliriva cyutā  haiyaṃgavīnapiṇḍānāmīriteva paramparā  himavṛṣṭirivodārā muktāhāracayopamā  aindavī raśmimāleva kṣīrormīṇāmivātatiḥ  kiñjalkāmbhojavalitā bhramadbhṛṅgakadambakā  sītkāragāyadāmodimadhurānilalolitā  prabhramatketakīvyūhā prasphuratkairavotkarā  prapatatkundavalayā calatkuvalayālayā  āpūritāṅgaṇarasā gṛhācchādanacatvarā  udgrīvapuravāstavyanaranārīvilokitā  nirabhrotpalasaṃkāśavyomavṛṣṭiranākulā  adṛṣṭapūrvā sarvasya janasya janitasmayā  adṛśyāmbarasiddhaughakarotkarasamīritā  sā muhūrtacaturbhāgaṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ papāta ha  āpūritasabhāloke śānte kusumavarṣaṇe  imaṃ siddhagaṇālāpaṃ śuśruvuste sabhāgatāḥ  ākalpaṃ siddhasenāsu bhramadbhirabhitodivam  apūrvamidamasmābhiḥ śrutaṃ śrutirasāyanam  yadanena kilodāramuktaṃ raghukulendunā  vītarāgatayā taddhi vākpaterapyagocaram  aho bata mahatpuṇyamadyāsmābhiridaṃ śrutam  vaco rāmamukhodbhūtaṃ mahāhlādakaraṃ dhiyaḥ  upaśamāmṛtasundaramādarā dadhigatottamatāpadameṣa yat  kathitavānucitaṃ raghunandanaḥ sapadi tena vayaṃ pratibodhitāḥ  siddhā ūcuḥ  pāvanasyāsya vacasaḥ proktasya raghuketunā  nirṇayaṃ śrotumucitaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ maharṣibhiḥ  nāradavyāsapulahapramukhā munipuṅgavāḥ  āgacchatāśvavighnena sarva eva maharṣayaḥ  patāmaḥ paritaḥ puṇyāmetāṃ dāśarathīṃ sabhām  nīrandhrāṃ kanakodyotāṃ padminīmiva ṣaṭpadāḥ  śrīvālmīkiruvāca  ityuktā sā samastaiva vyomavāsanivāsinī  tāṃ papāta sabhāṃ tatra divyā muniparamparā  ratnāvalirivānyonyaṃ nānāvarṇakṛtāṃgikā  muktāvalirivānyonyaṃ kṛtaśobhātiśāyinī  kaumudīvṛṣṭiranyeva dvitīyevārkamaṇḍalī  saṃbhṛtevātikālena pūrṇacandraparamparā  tārājāla ivāmbhodo vyāso yatra virājate  tāraugha iva śītāṃśurnāradotra virājate  deveṣviva surādhīśaḥ pulastyotra virājate  āditya iva devānāmaṃgirāstu virājate  athāsyāṃ siddhasenāyāṃ patantyāṃ nabhaso rasām  uttasthau munisaṃpūrṇā tadā dāśarathī sabhā  miśrībhūtā virejuste nabhaścaramahīcarāḥ  parasparavṛtāṃgābhā bhāsayanto diśo daśa  veṇudaṇḍāvṛtakarā līlākamaladhāriṇaḥ  dūrvāṃkurākrāntaśikhāḥ sacūḍāmaṇimūrdhajāḥ  jaṭājūṭaiśca kapilā maulimālitamastakāḥ  prakoṣṭhagākṣavalayā mallikāvalayānvitāḥ  cīravalkalasaṃvītāḥ srakkauśeyāvaguṇṭhitāḥ  vilolamekhalāpāśāścalanmuktākalāpinaḥ  vasiṣṭhaviśvāmitrau tānpūjayāmāsatuḥ kramāt  arghyaiḥ pādyaurvacobhiśca sarvāneva nabhaścarān  vasiṣṭhaviśvāmitrau te pūjayāmāsurādarāt  arghyaiḥ pādyairvacobhiśca nabhaścaramahāgaṇāḥ  sarvādareṇa siddhaughaṃ pūjayāmāsa bhūpatiḥ  siddhaugho bhūpatiṃ caiva kuśalapraśnavārtayā  taistaiḥ praṇayasaṃrambhairanyonyaṃ prāptasatkriyāḥ  upāviśanviṣṭareṣu nabhaścaramahīcarāḥ  vacobhiḥ puṣpavarṣeṇa sādhuvādena cābhitaḥ  rāmaṃ te pūjayāmāsuḥ puraḥ praṇatamāsthitam  āsāṃcakre ca tatrāsau rājyalakṣmīvirājitaḥ  viśvāmitro vasiṣṭhaśca vāmadevotha mantriṇaḥ  nārado devaputraśca vyāsaśca munipuṃgavaḥ  marīciratha durvāsā munirāṃgirasastathā  kratuḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ śaralomā munīśvaraḥ  vātsyāyano bharadvājo vālmīkirmunipuṃgavaḥ  uddālaka ṛcīkaśca śaryātiścyavanastathā  ete cānye ca bahavo vedavedāṃgapāragāḥ  jñātajñeyā mahātmāna āsthitāstatra nāyakāḥ  vasiṣṭhaviśvāmitrābhyāṃ saha te nāradādayaḥ  idamūcuranūcānā rāmamānamitānanam  aho bata kumāreṇa kalyāṇaguṇaśālinī  vāguktā paramodārā vairāgyarasagarbhiṇī  pariniṣṭhitavaktavyaṃ sabodhamucitaṃ sphuṭam  udāraṃ priyamāryārhamavihnalamapi sphuṭam  abhivyaktapadaṃ spaṣṭamiṣṭaṃ spaṣṭaṃ ca tuṣṭimat  karoti rāghavaproktaṃ vacaḥ kasya na vismayam  śatādekatamasyaiva sarvodāracamatkṛtiḥ  īpsitārthārpaṇaikāntadakṣā bhavati bhāratī  kumāra tvāṃ vinā kasya vivekaphalaśālinī  paraṃ vikāsamāyāti prajñāśaralatātatā  prajñādīpaśikhā yasya rāmasyeva hṛdi sthitā  prajvalatyasamālokakāriṇī sa pumānsmṛtaḥ  raktamāṃsāsthiyantrāṇi bahūnyatitarāṇi ca  padārthānabhikarṣanti nāsti teṣu sacetanaḥ  janmamṛtyujarāduḥkhamanuyānti punaḥpunaḥ  vimṛśanti na saṃsāraṃ paśavaḥ parimohitāḥ  kathaṃcitkvacidevaiko dṛśyate vimalāśayaḥ  pūrvāparavicārārho yathāyamarimardanaḥ  anuttamacamatkāraphalāḥ subhagamūrtayaḥ  bhavyā hi viralā loke sahakāradrumā iva  samyagdṛṣṭajagadyātrā svavivekacamatkṛtiḥ  asminmānyamatāvantariyamadyeva dṛśyate  subhagāḥ sulabhārohāḥ phalapallavaśālinaḥ  jāyante taravo deśe na tu candanapādapāḥ  vṛkṣāḥ prativanaṃ santi nityaṃ saphalapallavāḥ  natvapūrvacamatkāro lavaṅgaḥ sulabhaḥ sadā  jyotsneva śītā śaśinaḥ sutaroriva mañjarī  puṣpādāmodalekheva dṛṣṭā rāmāccamatkṛtiḥ  asminnuddāmadaurātmyadaivanirmāṇanirmite  dvijendrā dagdhasaṃsāre sāro hyatyantadurlabhaḥ  yatante sārasaṃprāptau ye yaśonidhayo dhiyaḥ  dhanyā dhuri satāṃ gaṇyāsta eva puruṣottamāḥ  na rāmeṇa samostīha dṛṣṭo lokeṣu kaścana  vivekavānudārātmā na bhāvī ceti no matiḥ  sakalalokacamatkṛtikāriṇopyabhimataṃ yadi rāghavacetasaḥ  phalati no tadime vayameva hi sphuṭataraṃ munayo hatabuddhayaḥ  vālmīkiruvāca  iti nādena mahatā vacasyukte sabhāgataiḥ  rāmamagragataṃ prītyā viśvāmitrobhyabhāṣata  na rāghava tavāstyanyajjñeyaṃ jñānavatāṃ vara  svayaiva sūkṣmayā buddhyā sarvaṃ vijñātavānasi  kevalaṃ mārjanāmātraṃ manāgevopayujyate  svabhāvavimale nityaṃ svabuddhimukure tava  bhagavadvyāsaputrasya śukasyeva matistava  viśrāntimātramevāntarjñātajñeyāpyapekṣate  śrīrāma uvāca  bhagavadvyāsaputrasya śukasya bhagavankatham  jñeyepyādau na viśrāntaṃ viśrāntaṃ ca dhiyā punaḥ  viśvāmitra uvāca  ātmodantasamaṃ rāma kathyamānamidaṃ mayā  śrṛṇu vyāsātmajodantaṃ janmanāmantakāraṇam  yoyamañjanaśailābho niviṣṭo hemaviṣṭare  pārśve tava piturvyāso bhagavānbhāskaradyutiḥ  asyābhūdinduvadanastanayo nayakovidaḥ  śuko nāma mahāprājño yajño mūrtyeva susthitaḥ  pravicārayato lokayātrāmalamimāṃ hṛdi  taveva kila tasyāpi viveka udbhūdayam  tenāsau svavivekena svayameva mahāmanāḥ  pravicārya ciraṃ cāru yatsatyaṃ tadavāptavān  svayaṃ prāpte pare vastunyaviśrāntamanāḥ sthitaḥ  idaṃ vastviti viśvāsaṃ nāsāvātmanyupāyayau  kevalaṃ virarāmāsya ceto vigatacāpalam  bhogebhyo bhūribhaṅgebhyo dhārābhya iva cātakaḥ  ekadā somalaprajño merāvekāntasusthitam  papraccha pitaraṃ bhaktyā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ munim  saṃsārāḍambaramidaṃ kathamabhyutthitaṃ mune  kathaṃ ca praśamaṃ yāti kiyatkasya kadeti vā  iti pṛṣṭena muninā vyāsenākhilamātmaje  yathāvadamalaṃ proktaṃ vaktavyaṃ viditātmanā  ājñāsiṣaṃ pūrvametadahamityatha tatpituḥ  sa śukaḥ śubhayā buddhyā na vākyaṃ bahvamanyata  vyāsopi bhagavānbuddhavā putrābhiprāyamīdṛśam  pratyuvāca punaḥ putraṃ nāhaṃ jānāmi tattvataḥ  janako nāma bhūpālo vidyate vasudhātale  yathāvadvettyasau vedyaṃ tasmātsarvamavāpsyasi  pitretyukte śukaḥ prāyātsumerorvasudhātale  videhanagarīṃ prāpa janakenābhipālitām  āveditosau yāṣṭīkairjanakāya mahātmane  dvāri vyāsasuto rājañśukotra sthitavāniti  jijñāsārthaṃ śukasyāsāvāstāmevetyavajñayā  uktvā babhūva janakastūṣṇīṃ sapta dinānyatha  tataḥ praveśayāmāsa janakaḥ śukamaṅgaṇam  tatrāhāni sa saptaiva tathaivāvasadunmanāḥ  atha praveśayāmāsa janakontaḥpuraṃ śukam  rājā na dṛśyate tāvaditi sapta dināni ca  tatronmadābhiḥ kāntābhirbhojanairbhogasaṃcayaiḥ  janako lālayāmāsa śukaṃ śaśisamānanam  te bhogāstāni duḥkhāni vyāsaputrasya tanmanaḥ  nājahnurmandapavanā baddhapīṭhamivācalam  kevalaṃ susamaḥ svastho maunī muditamānasaḥ  atiṣṭhatsa śukastatra saṃpūrṇa iva candramāḥ  parijñātasvabhāvaṃ taṃ śukaṃ sa janako nṛpaḥ  ānītaṃ muditātmānamavalokya nanāma ha  niḥśeṣitajagatkāryaṃ prāptākhilamanoratha  kimīpsitaṃ tavetyāśu kṛtasvāgatamāha tam  śrīśuka uvāca  saṃsārāḍambaramidaṃ kathamabhyutthitaṃ guro  kathaṃ praśamamāyāti yathāvatkathayāśu me  viśvāmitra uvāca  janakeneti pṛṣṭena śukasya kathitaṃ tadā  tadeva yatpurā proktaṃ tasya pitrā mahātmanā  śrīśuka uvāca  svayameva mayā pūrvametajjñātaṃ vivekataḥ  etadeva ca pṛṣṭena pitrā me samudāhṛtam  bhavatāpyeṣa evārthaḥ kathito vāgvidāṃ vara  eṣa eva ca vākyārthaḥ śāstreṣu paridṛśyate  yathāyaṃ svavikalpotthaḥ svavikalpaparikṣayāt  kṣīyate dagdhasaṃsāro niḥsāra iti niścayaḥ  tatkimetanmahābāho satyaṃ brūhi mamācalam  tvatto viśrāntimāpnomi cetasā bhramatā jagat  janaka uvāca  nātaḥ parataraḥ kaścinniścayostyaparo mune  svayameva tvayā jñātaṃ gurutaśca punaḥ śrutam  avicchinnacidātmaikaḥ pumānastīha netarat  svasaṃkalpavaśādbaddho niḥsaṃkalpaśca mucyate  tena tvayā sphuṭaṃ jñātaṃ jñeyaṃ yasya mahātmanaḥ  bhogebhyo viratirjātā dṛśyātprāksakalādiha  tava bāla mahāvīra matirviratimāgatā  bhogebhyo dīrgharogebhyaḥkimanyacchrotumicchasi  na tathā pūrṇatā jātā sarvajñānamahānidheḥ  tiṣṭhatastapasi sphāre pitustava yathā tava  vyāsādadhika evāhaṃ vyāsaśiṣyosi tatsutaḥ  bhogecchātānaveneha mattopyatyadhiko bhavān  prāptaṃ prāptavyamakhilaṃ bhavatā pūrṇacetasā  na dṛśye patasi brahmanmuktastvaṃ bhrāntimutsṛja  anuśiṣṭaḥ sa ityevaṃ janakena mahātmanā  atiṣṭhatsa śukastūṣṇīṃ svacche paramavastuni  vītaśokabhayāyāso nirīhaśchinnasaṃśayaḥ  jagāma śikharaṃ meroḥ samādhyarthamaninditam  tatra varṣasahasrāṇi nirvikalpasamādhinā  daśa sthitvā śaśāmāsāvātmanyasnehadīpavat  vyapagatakalanākalaṅkaśuddhaḥ svayamamalātmani pāvane padesau  salilakaṇa ivāmbudhau mahātmā vigalitavāsanamekatāṃ jagāma  viśvāmitra uvāca  tasya vyāsatanūjasya malamātropamārjanam  yathopayuktaṃ te rāma tāvadevopayujyate  jñeyametena vijñātamaśeṣeṇa munīśvarāḥ  svadantesmai na yadbhogā rogā iva sumedhase  jñātajñeyasya manaso nūnametaddhi lakṣaṇam  na svadante samagrāṇi bhogavṛndāni yatpunaḥ  bhogabhāvanayā yāti bandho dārḍhyamavastujaḥ  tayopaśāntayā yāti bandho jagati tānavam  vāsanātānavaṃ rāma mokṣa ityucyate budhaiḥ  padārthavāsanādārḍhyaṃ bandha ityabhidhīyate  svātmatattvābhigamanaṃ bhavati prāyaśo nṛṇām  mune viṣayavairasyaṃ kadarthādupajāyate  samyakpaśyati yastajjño jñātajñeyaḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ  na svadante balādeva tasmai bhogā mahātmane  yaśaḥprabhṛtinā yasmai hetunaiva vinā punaḥ  bhuvi bhogā na rocante sa jīvanmukta ucyate  jñeyaṃ yāvanna vijñātaṃ tāvattāvanna jāyate  viṣayeṣvaratirjantormarubhūmau latā yathā  ataeva hi vijñātajñeyaṃ viddhi raghūdvaham  yadenaṃ rañjayantyetā na ramyā bhogabhūmayaḥ  rāmo yadantarjānāti tadvastvityeva sanmukhāt  ākarṇya cittaviśrāntimāpnotyeva munīśvarāḥ  kevalaṃ kevalībhāvaviśrāntiṃ samapekṣate  rāmabuddhiḥ śarallakṣmīḥ khalu viśramaṇaṃ yathā  atrāsya cittaviśrāntyai rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ  yuktiṃ kathayatu śrīmānvasiṣṭho bhagavānayam  raghūṇāmeṣa sarveṣāṃ prabhuḥ kulaguruḥ sadā  sarvajñaḥ sarvasākṣī ca trikālāmaladarśanaḥ  vasiṣṭha bhagavanpūrvaṃ kaccitsmarasi yatsvayam  āvayorvairaśāntyarthaṃ śreyase ca mahādhiyām  niṣadhādrermunīnāṃ ca sānau saralasaṃkule  upadiṣṭaṃ bhagavatā jñānaṃ padmabhuvā bahu  yena yuktimatā brahmanjñāneneyaṃ hi vāsanā  sāṃsārī nūnamāyāti śamaṃ śyāmeva bhāsvatā  tadeva yuktimajjñeyaṃ rāmāyāntenivāsine  brahmannupadiśāśu tvaṃ yena viśrāntimeṣyati  kadarthanā ca naivaiṣā rāmo hi gatakalpaṣaḥ  nirmale mukure vaktramayatnenaiva bimbati  tajjñānaṃ sa ca śāstrārthastvadvaidagdhyamaninditam  sacchiṣyāya viraktāya sādho yadupadiśyate  aśiṣyāyāviraktāya yatkiṃcidupadiśyate  tatprayātyapavitratvaṃ gokṣīraṃ śvadṛtāviva  vītarāgabhayakrodhā nirmānā galitainasaḥ  vadanti tvādṛśā yatra tatra viśrāmyatīha dhīḥ  ityukte gādhiputreṇa vyāsanāradapūrvakāḥ  munayaste tamevārthaṃ sādhusādhvityapūjayan  athovāca mahātejā rājñaḥ pārśve vyavasthitaḥ  brahmeva brahmaṇaḥ putro vasiṣṭho bhagavānmuniḥ  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  mune yadādiśasi me tadavighnaṃ karomyaham  kaḥ samarthaḥ samarthopi satāṃ laṅghayituṃ vacaḥ  ahaṃ hi rājaputrāṇāṃ rāmādīnāṃ manastamaḥ  jñānenāpanayāmyāśu dīpeneva niśātamaḥ  smarāmyakhaṇḍitaṃ sarva saṃsārabhramaśāntaye  niṣadhādrau purā proktaṃ yajjñānaṃ padmajanmanā  vālmīkiruvāca  iti nigaditavānasau mahātmā parikarabandhagṛhītavaktṛtejāḥ  akathayadidamajñatopaśāntyai paramapadaikavibodhanaṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  pūrvamuktaṃ bhagavatā yajjñānaṃ padmajanmanā  sargādau lokaśāntyarthaṃ tadidaṃ kathayāmyaham  śrīrāma uvāca  kathayiṣyasi vistīrṇā bhagavanmokṣasaṃhitām  imaṃ tāvatkṣaṇaṃ jātaṃ saṃśayaṃ me nivāraya  pitā śukasya sarvajño gururvyāso mahāmatiḥ  videhamukto na kathaṃ kathaṃ muktaḥ sutosya saḥ  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  paramārkaprakāśāntastrijagattrasareṇavaḥ  utpatyotpatya līnā ye na saṃkhyāmupayānti te  vartamānāśca yāḥ santi trailokyagaṇakoṭayaḥ  śakyante tāśca saṃkhyātuṃ naiva kāścana kenacit  bhaviṣyanti parāmbhodhau jantasargataraṅgakāḥ  tāṃśca vai parisaṃkhyātuṃ sā kathaiva na vidyate  śrīrāma uvāca  yā bhūtā yā bhaviṣyantyo jagatsargaparamparāḥ  tāsāṃ vicāraṇā yuktā vartamānāstu kā iva  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  tiryakpuruṣadevāderyo nāma sa vinaśyati  yasminneva pradeśesau tadaivedaṃ prapaśyati  ātivāhikanāmnāntaḥ svahṛdyeva jagattrayam  vyomni cittaśarīreṇa vyomātmānubhavatyajaḥ  evaṃ mṛtā mriyante ca mariṣyanti ca koṭayaḥ  bhūtānāṃ yāṃ jagantyāśāmuditāni pṛthakpṛthak  saṃkalpanirmāṇamiva manorājyavilāsavat  indrajālāmāla iva kathārthapratibhāsavat  durvātabhūkampa iva trastabālapiśācavat  muktālīvāmale vyomni nauspandataruyānavat  svapnasaṃvittiṣuravatsmṛtijātakhapuṣpavat  jagatsaṃsaraṇaṃ svāntarmṛtonubhavati svayam  tatrātipariṇāmena tadeva ghanatāṃ gatam  ihalokoyamityeva jīvākāśe vijṛmbhate  punastatraiva jagnedvāmaraṇādyanubhūtimān  paraṃ lokaṃ kalpayati mṛtastatra tathā punaḥ  tadantaranye puruṣāstevāmantastathetare  saṃsāra iti bhāntīme kadalīdalapīṭhavat  na pṛmbyādimahābhūtagaṇā na ca jagatkramāḥ  mṛtānāṃ santi tatrāpi tathāpyeṣāṃ jagadbhamāḥ  avidyaiva hyananteyaṃ nānāprasaraśālinī  jaḍānāṃ saridādīrghā taratsargataraṅgiṇī  paramārthāmbudhau sphāre rāma sargataraṅgakāḥ  bhūyobhūyonuvartante ta evānye ca bhūriśaḥ  sarvataḥ sadṛśāḥ kecitkulakramamanoguṇeḥ  kecidardhena sadṛśāḥ keciccātivilakṣaṇāḥ  imaṃ vyāsaṅga tatra dvātriṃśaṃ saṃsmarāmyaham  yathāsaṃbhavavijñānadṛśā saṃlaśyamānayā  dvādaśālpadhiyastatra kulākārehitaiḥ samāḥ  daśa sarve samākārāḥ śiṣṭāḥ kulavilakṣaṇāḥ  adyapayanye bhaviṣyanti vyāsavālmīkayastathā  bhṛgvaṅgiraḥpulastyāśca tathaivāpyanyathaiva ca  narāḥ surarṣidevānāṃ gaṇāḥ saṃbhūya bhūriśaḥ  utpadyante vilīyante kadācicca pṛthakpṛthak  brāhmī dvāsaptatistraitā āsīdasti bhaviṣyati  sa evānyaśca lokāśca tvaṃ cāhaṃ ceti vedayaham  krameṇāsya muneritthaṃ vyāsasyādbhutakarmaṇaḥ  saṃlakṣyatevatāroyaṃ daśamo dīrghadarśinaḥ  abhūma vyāsavālmīkiyuktā vayamanekaśaḥ  abhūma vayameveme bahuśaśca pṛthakpṛthak  abhūm vayameveme sadṛśā itare vidaḥ  abhūma vayameveme nānākārā samāśayā  bhāvyamadyāpyaneneha nanu vārāṣṭakaṃ punaḥ  bhūyopi bhārataṃ nāma setihāsaṃ kariṣyati  kṛtvā vedavibhāgaṃ ca nītvānena kulaprathām  brahmatvaṃ ca tathā kṛtvā bhāvyaṃ vaidehamokṣaṇam  vītaśokabhayaḥ śāntanirvāṇo gatakalpanaḥ  jīvanmukto jitamanā vyāsoyamiti varṇitaḥ  vittaktadhuvayaḥkarmavidyāvijñānaceṣṭitaiḥ  samāni santi bhūtāni kadācinnatu tāni tu  kvacitsargaśataistāni bhavanti na bhavanti vā  kadācidapi māyeyamitthamantavivarjitā  yacchatīyaṃ viparyāsaṃ bhūribhūtaparamparā  bījarāśirivājasraṃ pūryamāṇaḥ punaḥpunaḥ  tenaiva saṃniveśena tathānyena punaḥpunaḥ  sargākārāḥ pravartante taraṅgāḥ kālavāridheḥ  āśvastāntaḥkaraṇaḥ śāntavikalpaḥ svarūpasāramayaḥ  paramaśamāmṛtatṛptastiṣṭhati vidvānnirāvaraṇaḥ  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  saumyāmbutve taraṅgatve salilasyāmbutā yathā  samaivābdhau tathādehasadehamunimuktatā  sadehā vāstvadehā vā muktatā viṣaye na ca  anāsvāditabhogasya kuto bhojyānubhūtayaḥ  jīvanmukta muniśreṣṭhaṃ kevalaṃ hi padārthavat  paśyāmaḥ purato nāsya punarvighnontarāśayam  sadehādehamuktānāṃ bhedaḥ ko bodharūpiṇām  yadevāmbutaraṅgatve saumyatvepi tadeva tat  na manāgapi bhedosti sadehādehamuktayoḥ  saspandopyathavāspando vāyureva yathānilaḥ  sadehā vā videhā vā muktatā na pramāspadam  asmākamapi tasyāsti svaikatāstyavibhāginī  tasmātprakṛtamevedaṃ śṛṇu śravaṇabhūṣaṇam  mayopadiśyamānaṃ tvaṃ jñānamajñāndhyanāśanam  sarvameveha hi sadā saṃsāre raghunandana  samyakprayuktātsarveṇa pauruṣātsamavāpyate  iha hīndorivodeti śītalāhlādanaṃ hṛdi  parispandaphalaprāptau pauruṣādeva nānyataḥ  pauruṣaṃ spandaphalavaddṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣato nayat  kalpitaṃ mohitairmandairdaivaṃ kiṃcinna vidyate  sādhūpadiṣṭamārgeṇa yanmanoṅgaviceṣṭitam  tatpauruṣaṃ tatsaphalamanyadunmattaceṣṭitam  yo yamarthaṃ prārthayate tadarthaṃ cehate kramāt  avaśyaṃ sa tamāpnoti na cedardhānnivartate  pauruṣeṇa prayatnena trailokyaiśvaryasundarām  kaścitprāṇiviśeṣo hi śakratāṃ samupāgataḥ  pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena sahasāmbhoruhāspadam  kaścideva cidullāso brahmatāmadhitiṣṭhati  sāreṇa puruṣārthena svenaiva garuḍadhvajaḥ  kaścideva pumāneva puruṣottamatāṃ gataḥ  pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena lalanāvalitākṛtiḥ  śarīrī kaścideveha gataścandrārdhacūḍatām  prāktanaṃ caihikaṃ ceti dvividhaṃ viddhi pauruṣam  prāktanodyatanenāśu puruṣārthena jīyate  yatnavadbhirdṛḍhābhyāsaiḥ prajñotsāhasamanvitaiḥ  meravopi nigīryante kaiva prākpauruṣe kathā  śāstraniyantritapauruṣaparamā puruṣasya puruṣatā yā syāt  abhimataphalabharasiddhyai bhavati hi saivānyathā tvanarthāya  kasyāṃcitsvayamātmaduḥsthitivaśātpuṃso daśāyāṃ śanai raṅgulyagranipīḍitaikaculukādāvāpabindurbahuḥ  kasyāṃcijjalarāśiparvatapuradvīpāntarālīkṛtā bhartavyocitasaṃvibhāgakaraṇe pṛthvī na pṛthvī bhavet  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  pravṛttireva prathamaṃ yathāśāstravihāriṇām  prabheva varṇabhedānāṃ sādhanī sarvakarmaṇām  manasā vāñchate yacca yathāśāstraṃ na karmaṇā  sādhyate mattalīlāsau mohanī nārthasādhanī  yathā saṃyatate yena tathā tenānubhūyate  svakarmaiveti cāstenyā vyatiriktā na daivadṛk  ucchāstraṃ śāstritaṃ ceti dvividhaṃ pauruṣaṃ smṛtam  tatrocchāstramanarthāya paramārthāya śāstritam  dvau huḍāviva yudhyete puruṣārthau samāsamau  prāktanaścaihikaścaiva śāmyatyatrālpavīryavān  ataḥ puruṣayatnena yatitavyaṃ yathā tathā  puṃsā tantreṇa sadyogādyenāśvadyatano jayet  dvau huḍāviva yudhyete puruṣārthau samāsamau  ātmīyaścānyadīyaśca jayatyatibalastayoḥ  anarthaḥ prāpyate yatra śāstritādapi pauruṣāt  anarthakartṛ balavattatra jñeyaṃ svapauruṣam  paraṃ pauruṣamāśritya dantairdantānvicūrṇayan  śubhenāśubhamudyuktaṃ prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ jayet  prāktanaḥ puruṣārthosau māṃ niyojayatīti dhīḥ  balādadhaspadīkāryā pratyakṣādadhikā na sā  tāvattāvatprayatnena yatitavyaṃ supauruṣam  prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ yāvadaśubhaṃ śāmyati svayam  doṣaḥ śāmyatyasaṃdehaṃ prāktanodyatanairguṇaiḥ  dṛṣṭāntotra hyastanasya doṣasyādya guṇaiḥ kṣayaḥ  asaddaivamadhaḥkṛtvā nityamudriktayā dhiyā  saṃsārottaraṇaṃ bhūtyai yatetādhātumātmani  na gantavyamanudyogaiḥ sāmyaṃ puruṣagardabhaiḥ  udyogastu yathāśāstraṃ lokadvitayasiddhaye  saṃsārakuharādasmānnirgantavyaṃ svayaṃ balāt  pauruṣaṃ yatnamāśritya hariṇevāripañjarāt  pratyahaṃ pratyavekṣeta dehaṃ naśvaramātmanaḥ  saṃtyajetpaśubhistulyaṃ śrayetsatpuruṣocitam  kiṃcitkāntānnapānādikalilaṃ komalaṃ gṛhe  vraṇe kīṭa ivāsvādya vayaḥ kāryaṃ na bhasmasāt  śubhena pauruṣeṇāśu śubhamāsādyate phalam  aśubhenāśubhaṃ nityaṃ daivaṃ nāma na kiṃcana  pratyakṣamānamutsṛjya yonumānamupaityasau  svabhujābhyāmimau sarpāviti prekṣya palāyate  daivaṃ saṃprerayati māmiti dagdhadhiyāṃ mukham  adṛṣṭaśreṣṭhadṛṣṭīnāṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmīrnivartate  tasmātpuruṣayatnena vivekaṃ pūrvamāśrayet  ātmajñānamahārthāni śāstrāṇi pravicārayet  citte cintayatāmarthaṃ yathāśāstraṃ nijehitaiḥ  asaṃsādhayatāmeva mūḍhānāṃ dhigdurīpsitam  pauruṣaṃ ca navānantaṃ na yatnamabhivācchyate  na yatnenāpi mahatā prāpyate ratnamaśmataḥ  yathā ghaṭaḥ parimito yathā parimitaḥ paṭaḥ  niyataḥ parimāṇasthaḥ puruṣārthastathaiva ca  sa ca sacchāstrasatsaṅgasadācārairnijaṃ phalam  dadātīti svabhāvoyamanyathā nārthasiddhaye  svarūpaṃ pauruṣasyaitadevaṃ vyavaharannaraḥ  yāti niṣphalayatnatvaṃ na kadācana kaścana  dainyadāridryaduḥkhārtā apyanye puruṣottamāḥ  pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena yātā devendratulyatām  ābālyādalamabhyastaiḥ śāstrasatsaṅgamādibhiḥ  guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svārthaḥ saṃprāpyate yataḥ  iti pratyakṣato dṛṣṭamanubhūtaṃ śrutaṃ kṛtam  daivāttamiti manyante ye hatāste kubuddhayaḥ  ālasyaṃ yadi na bhavejjagatyanarthaḥ ko na syādbahudhanako bahuśruto vā  ālasyādiyamavaniḥ sasāgarāntā saṃpūrṇā narapaśubhiśca nirdhanaiśca  bālye gateviratakalpitakelilole dordaṇḍamaṇḍitavayaḥprabhṛti prayatnāt  satsaṅgamaiḥ padapadārthaviśuddhabuddhiḥ kuryānnaraḥ svaguṇadoṣavicāraṇāni  vālmīkiruvāca  ityuktavatyatha munau divaso jagāma sāyaṃtanāya vidhayestamino jagāma  snātuṃ sabhā kṛtanamaskaraṇā jagāma śyāmākṣaye ravikareṇa sahājagāma  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  tasmātprākpauruṣāddaivaṃ nānyattatprojjhya dūrataḥ  sādhusaṃgamasacchāstrairjīvamuttārayedbalāt  yathā yathā prayatnaḥ syādbhavedāśu phalaṃ tathā  iti pauruṣamevāsti daivamastu tadeva ca  duḥkhādyathā duḥkhakāle hā kaṣṭamiti kathyate  hākaṣṭaśabdaparyāyastathā hā daivamityapi  prāksvakarmetarākāraṃ daivaṃ nāma na vidyate  bālaḥ prabalapuṃseva tajjetumiha śakyate  hyastano duṣṭa ācāra ācāreṇādya cāruṇā  yathāśu śubhatāmeti prāktanaṃ karma tattathā  tajjayāya yatante ye na lobhalavalampaṭāḥ  te dīnāḥ prākṛtā mūḍhāḥ sthitā daivaparāyaṇāḥ  pauruṣeṇa kṛtaṃ karma daivādyadabhinaśyati  tatra nāśayiturjñeyaṃ pauruṣaṃ balavattaram  yadekavṛntaphalayorathaikaṃ śūnyakoṭaram  tatra prayatnaḥ sphuritastathā tadrasasaṃvidaḥ  yatprayānti jagadbhāvāḥ saṃsiddhā api saṃkṣayam  kṣayakārakayatnasya hyatra jñeyaṃ mahadbalam  dvau huḍāviva yudhyete puruṣārthau parasparam  ya eva balavāṃstatra sa eva jayati kṣaṇāt  bhikṣuko maṅgalebhena nṛpo yatkriyate balāt  tadamātyebhapaurāṇāṃ prayatnasya balaṃ mahat  pauruṣeṇānnamākramya yathā dantena cūrṇyate  anyaḥ pauruṣamāśritya tathā śūreṇa cūrṇyate  annabhūtā hi mahatāṃ laghavo yatnaśālinām  yatheṣṭaṃ viniyojyante tena karmasu loṣṭavat  śaktasya pauruṣaṃ dṛśyamadṛśyaṃ vāpi yadbhavet  taddaivamityaśaktena buddhamātmanyabuddhinā  bhūtānāṃ balavadbhūtaṃ yanna daivamiti sthitam  tatteṣāmapyadhiṣṭhātṛ satāmetatsphuṭaṃ mithaḥ  śāstrāmātyebhapaurāṇāmavikalpā svabhāvadhīḥ  yā sā bhikṣukarājyasya kartṛ dhartṛ prajāsthiteḥ  bhikṣuko maṅgalebhena nṛpo yatkriyate kvacit  prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ tatra balavadvāpi kāraṇam  aihikaḥ prāktanaṃ hanti prāktanodyatanaṃ balāt  sarvadā puruṣaspandastatrānudvegavāñjayī  dvayoradyatanasyaiva pratyakṣādbalitā bhavet  daivaṃ jetuṃ yato yatnairbālo yūneva śakyate  meghena nīyate yadvadvatsaropārjitā kṛṣiḥ  meghasya puruṣārthosau jayatyadhikayatnavān  krameṇopārjitepyarthe naṣṭe kāryā na kheditā  na balaṃ yatra me śaktaṃ tatra kā paridevanā  yanna śaknomi tasyārthe yadi duḥkhaṃ karomyaham  tadamāritamṛtyorme yuktaṃ pratyaharodanam  deśakālakriyādravyavaśato visphurantyamī  sarva eva jagadbhāvā jayatyadhikayatnavān  tasmātpauruṣamāśritya sacchāstraiḥ satsamāgamaiḥ  prajñāmamalatāṃ nītvā saṃsārajaladhiṃ taret  prāktanaścaihikaścemau puruṣārthau phaladdrumau  saṃjātau puruṣāraṇye jayatyabhyadhikastayoḥ  karma yaḥ prāktanaṃ tucchaṃ na nihanti śubhehitaiḥ  ajño janturanīśosāvātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ  īśvaraprerito gacchetsvargaṃ narakameva vā  sa sadaiva parādhīnaḥ paśureva na saṃśayaḥ  yastūdāracamatkāraḥ sadācāravihāravān  sa niryāti jaganmohānmṛgendraḥ pañjarādiva  kaścinmāṃ prerayatyevamityanarthakukalpane  yaḥ sthitodṛṣṭamutsṛjya tyājyosau dūratodhamaḥ  vyavahārasahasrāṇi yānyupāyānti yānti ca  yathāśāstraṃ vihartavyaṃ teṣu tyaktvā sukhāsukhe  yathāśāstramanucchinnāṃ maryādāṃ svāmanujjhataḥ  upatiṣṭhanti sarvāṇi ratnānyambunidhāviva  svārthaprāpakakāryaikaprayatnaparatā budhaiḥ  proktā pauruṣaśabdena sā siddhyai śāstrayantritā  kriyayā spandadharmiṇyā svārthasādhakatā svayam  sādhusaṃgamasacchāstratīkṣṇayonnīyate dhiyā  anantaṃ samatānandaṃ paramārthaṃ vidurbudhāḥ  sa yebhyaḥ prāpyate nityaṃ te sevyāḥ śāstrasādhavaḥ  devalokādihāgatya lokadvayahitaṃ bhavet  prāktanaṃ pauruṣaṃ tadvai daivaśabdena kathyate  tadyuktametadetasminnāsti nāpavadāmahe  mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivaṃ manyante ye kṣayaṃ gatāḥ  nityaṃ svapauruṣādeva lokadvayahitaṃ bhavet  hyastanī duṣkriyābhyeti śobhāṃ satkriyayā yathā  adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmādyatnādyaḥ kāryavānbhavet  karāmalakavaddṛṣṭaṃ pauruṣādeva tatphalam  mūḍhaḥ pratyakṣamutsṛjya daivamohe nimajjati  sakalakāraṇakāryavivarjitaṃ nijavikalpabalādupakalpitam  tadanapekṣya hi daivamasanmayaṃ śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣamātmanaḥ  śāstraiḥ sadācaravijṛmbhitadeśadharmairyatkalpitaṃ phalamatīva ciraprarūḍham  tasminhṛdi sphurati copanameti cittamaṅgāvalī tadanu pauruṣametadāhuḥ  buddhvaiva pauruṣaphalaṃ puruṣatvametadātmaprayatnaparataiva sadaiva kāryā  neyā tataḥ saphalatāṃ paramāmathāsau sacchāstrasādhujanapaṇḍitasevanena  daivapauruṣavicāracārubhiścedamācaritamātmapauruṣam  nityameva jayatīti bhāvitaiḥ kārya āryajanasevayodyamaḥ  janmaprabandhamayamāmayameṣa jīvo buddhvaihikaṃ sahajapauruṣameva siddhyai  śāntiṃ nayatvavitathena varauṣadhena mṛṣṭena tuṣṭaparapaṇḍitasevanena  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  prāpya vyādhivinirmuktaṃ dehamalpādhivedanam  tathātmani samādadhyādyathā bhūyo na jāyate  daivaṃ puruṣakāreṇa yo nivartitumicchati  iha vāmutra jagati sa saṃpūrṇābhivāñchitaḥ  ye samudyogamutsṛjya sthitā daivaparāyaṇāḥ  te dharmamarthaṃ kāmaṃ ca nāśayantyātmavidviṣaḥ  saṃvitspando manaḥspanda aindriyaspanda eva ca  etāni puruṣārthasya rūpāṇyebhyaḥ phalodayaḥ  yathā saṃvedanaṃ cetastathā tatspandamṛcchati  tathaiva kāyaścalati tathaiva phalabhoktṛtā  ābālametatsaṃsiddhaṃ yatra yatra yathā yathā  daivaṃ tu na kvaciddṛṣṭamato jagati pauruṣam  puruṣārthena devānāṃ gurureva bṛhaspatiḥ  śukro daityendragurutāṃ puruṣārthena cāsthitaḥ  dainyadāridryaduḥkhārtā api sādho narottamāḥ  pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena yātā devendratulyatām  mahānto vibhavāsvādairnānāścaryasamāśrayāḥ  pauruṣeṇaiva doṣeṇa narakātithitāṃ gatāḥ  bhāvābhāvasahasreṣu daśāsu vividhāsu ca  svapauruṣavaśādeva nivṛttā bhūtajātayaḥ  śāstrato gurutaścaiva svataśceti trisiddhayaḥ  sarvatra puruṣārthasya na daivasya kadācana  aśubheṣu samāviṣṭaṃ śubheṣvevāvatārayet  prayatnāccittamityeṣa sarvaśāstrārthasaṃgrahaḥ  yacchreyo yadatucchaṃ ca yadapāyavivarjitam  tattadācara yatnena putreti guravaḥ sthitāḥ  yathā yathā prayatno me phalamāśu tathā tathā  ityahaṃ pauruṣādeva phalabhāṅ na tu daivataḥ  pauruṣāddṛśyate siddhiḥ pauruṣāddhīmatāṃ kramaḥ  daivamāśvāsanāmātraṃ duḥkhe pelavabuddhiṣu  pratyakṣapramukhairnityaṃ pramāṇaiḥ pauruṣakramaḥ  phalito dṛśyate loke deśāntaragamādikaḥ  bhoktā tṛpyati nābhoktā gantā gacchati nāgatiḥ  vaktā vakti na cāvaktā pauruṣaṃ saphalaṃ nṛṇām  pauruṣeṇa durantebhyaḥ saṃkaṭebhyaḥ subuddhayaḥ  samuttarantyayatnena na tu moghatayānayā  yo yo yathā prayatate sa sa tattatphalaikabhāk  na tu tūṣṇīṃ sthiteneha kenacitprāpyate phalam  śubhena puruṣārthena śubhamāsādyate phalam  aśubhenāśubhaṃ rāma yathecchasi tathā kuru  puruṣārthātphalaprāptirdeśakālavaśādiha  prāptā cireṇa śīghraṃ vā yāsau daivamiti smṛtā  na daivaṃ dṛśyate dṛṣṭyā na ca lokāntare sthitam  uktaṃ daivābhidhānena svarloke karmaṇaḥ phalam  puruṣo jāyate loke vardhate jīryate punaḥ  na tatra dṛśyate daivaṃ jarāyauvanabālyavat  arthaprāpakakāryaikaprayatnaparatā budhaiḥ  proktā pauruṣaśabdena sarvamāsādyatenayā  deśāddeśāntaraprāptirhastasya dravyadhāraṇam  vyāpāraśca tathāṅgānāṃ pauruṣeṇa na daivataḥ  anarthaprāptikāryaikaprayatnaparatā tu yā  proktā pronmattaceṣṭeti na kiṃcitprāpyatenayā  kriyayā spandadharmiṇyā svārthasādhakatā svayam  sādhusaṃgamasacchāstratīkṣṇayonnīyate dhiyā  anantasamatānandaṃ paramārthaṃ svakaṃ viduḥ  sa yebhyaḥ prāpyate yatnātsevyāste śāstrasādhavaḥ  sacchāstrādiguṇo matyā sacchāstrādiguṇānmatiḥ  vivardhete mithobhyāsātsarojāviva kālataḥ  ābālyādalamabhyastaiḥ śāstrasatsaṃgamādibhiḥ  guṇaiḥ puruṣayatnena svārthaḥ saṃpadyate hitaḥ  pauruṣeṇa jitā daityāḥ sthāpitā bhuvanakriyāḥ  racitāni jagantīha viṣṇunā na ca daivataḥ  jagati puruṣakārakāraṇesmin kuru raghunātha ciraṃ tathā prayatnam  vrajasi tarusarīsṛpābhidhānāṃ subhaga yathā na daśāmaśaṅka eva  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  nākṛtirna ca karmāṇi na spando na parākramaḥ  tanmithyājñānavadrūḍhaṃ daivaṃ nāma kimucyate  svakarmaphalasaṃprāptāvidamitthamitīti yāḥ  girastā daivanāmnaitāḥ prasiddhiṃ samupāgatāḥ  tatraiva mūḍhamatibhirdaivamastīti niścayaḥ  ātto duravabodhena rajjvāmiva bhujaṃgamaḥ  hyastanī duṣkriyābhyeti śobhāṃ satkriyayā yathā  adyaivaṃ prāktanī tasmādyatnātsatkāryavānbhavet  mūḍhānumānasaṃsiddhaṃ daivaṃ yasyāsti durmateḥ  daivāddāhosti naiveti gantavyaṃ tena pāvake  daivameveha cetkartuṃ puṃsaḥ kimiva ceṣṭayā  snānadānāsanoccārāndaivameva kariṣyati  kiṃvā śāstropadeśena mūkoyaṃ puruṣaḥ kila  saṃcāryate tu daivena kiṃ kasyehopadiśyate  na ca nispandatā loke dṛṣṭeha śavatāṃ vinā  spandācca phalasaṃprāptistasmāddaivaṃ nirarthakam  na cāmūrtena daivena mūrtasya sahakartṛtā  puṃsaḥ saṃdṛśyate kācittasmāddaivaṃ nirarthakam  mithoṅgāni samāsādya dvayorekaikakartṛtā  hastādīnāṃ hatatve ha na daivena kvacitkṛtam  manobuddhivadapyetaddaivaṃ nehānubhūyate  āgopālaṃ kṛtaprajñaistena daivamasatsadā  pṛthakcedbuddhiranyorthaḥ saiva cetkānyatā tayoḥ  kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇaṃ cetpauruṣaṃ kiṃ na kalpyate  nāmūrtestena saṅgosti nabhaseva vapuṣmataḥ  mūrtaṃ ca dṛśyate lagnaṃ tasmāddaivaṃ na vidyate  viniyokratha bhūtānāmastyanyaccejjagattraye  śerate bhūtavṛndāni daivaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyati  daivena tvabhiyuktohaṃ tatkaromīdṛśaṃ sthitam  samāśvāsanavāgeṣā na daivaṃ paramārthataḥ  mūḍhaiḥ prakalpitaṃ daivaṃ tatparāste kṣayaṃ gatāḥ  prājñāstu pauruṣārthena padamuttamatāṃ gatāḥ  ye śūrā ye ca vikrāntā ye prājñā ye ca paṇḍitāḥ  taistaiḥ kimiva lokesminvada daivaṃ pratīkṣyate  kālavidbhirvinirṇītā yasyāticirajīvitā  sa cejjīvati saṃchinnaśirāstaddaivamuttamam  kālavidbhirvinirṇītaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ yasya rāghava  anadhyāpita evāsau tajjñaśceddaivamuttamam  viśvāmitreṇa muninā daivamutsṛjya dūrataḥ  pauruṣeṇaiva saṃprāptaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ rāma nānyathā  asmābhiraparai rāma puruṣairmunitāṃ gataiḥ  pauruṣeṇaiva saṃprāptā ciraṃ gaganagāmitā  utsādya devasaṃghātaṃ cakrustribhuvanodare  pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena sāmrājyaṃ dānaveśvarāḥ  ālūnaśīrṇamābhogi jagadājahrurojasā  pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena dānavebhyaḥ sureśvarāḥ  rāma pauruṣayuktyā ca salilaṃ dhāryatenayā  ciraṃ karaṇḍake cāru na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam  bharaṇādānasaṃrambhavibhramaśramabhūmiṣu  śaktatā dṛśyate rāma na daivasyauṣadheriva  sakalakāraṇakāryavivarjitaṃ nijavikalpavaśādupakalpitam  tvamanapekṣya hi daivamasanmayaṃ śraya śubhāśaya pauruṣamuttamam  śrīrāma uvāca  bhagavantatvadharmajña pratiṣṭhāmalamāgatam  yalloke tadvada brahmandaiva nāma kimucyate  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  pauruṣaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ kartṛ rāghava netarat  phalabhoktṛ ca sarvatra na daivaṃ tatra kāraṇam  daivaṃ na kiṃcitkurute na bhuṅte na ca vidyate  na dṛśyate nādriyate kevalaṃ kalpanedṛśī  siddhasya pauruṣeṇeha phalasya phalaśālinā  śubhāśubhārthasaṃpattirdaivaśabdena kathyate  pauruṣopanatā nityamiṣṭāniṣṭasya vastunaḥ  prāptiriṣṭāpyaniṣṭā vā daivaśabdena kathyate  bhāvī tvavaśyamevārthaḥ puruṣārthaikasādhanaḥ  yaḥ sosmillokasaṃghāte daivaśabdena kathyate  nanu rāghava lokasya kasyacitkiṃcideva hi  daivamākāśarūpaṃ hi karoti na karoti ca  puruṣārthasya siddhasya śubhāśubhaphalodaye  idamitthaṃ sthitamiti grāmago grāmamāpnoti pattanārthī ca pattanam  yo yo yadvāsanastatra sa sa prayatate sadā  yadeva tīvrasaṃvegāddṛḍhaṃ karma kṛtaṃ purā  tadeva daivaśabdena paryāyeṇeha kathyate  evaṃ karmasthakarmāṇi kṛpaṇaḥ kiṃ karomyaham  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  ata eva hi rāma tvaṃ śreyaḥ prāpnoṣi śāśvatam  svaprayatnopanītena pauruṣeṇaiva nānyathā  dvividho vāsanāvyūhaḥ śubhaścaivāśubhaśca te  prāktano vidyate rāma dvayorekatarotha vā  vāsanaughena śuddhena tatra cedadya nīyase  tatkrameṇa śubhenaiva padaprāpsyasi śāśvatam  atha cedaśubho bhāvastvāṃ yojayati saṃkaṭe  prāktanastadasau yatnājjetavyo bhavatā balāt  prājñaścetanamātrastvaṃ na dehastvaṃ jaḍātmakaḥ  anyena cetasā tatte cetyatvaṃ kveva vidyate  anyastvāṃ cetayati cettaṃ cetayati koparaḥ  ka imaṃ cetayettasmādanavasthā na vāstavī  śubhāśubhābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ vahantī vāsanāsarit  pauruṣeṇa prayatnena yojanīyā śubhe pathi  aśubheṣu samāviṣṭaṃ śubheṣvevāvatāraya  svaṃ manaḥ puruṣārthena balena balināṃ vara  aśubhāccālitaṃ yāti śubhaṃ tasmādapītarat  jantościttaṃ tu śuvittanmuhūścatūyedgalāt  samatā sāṃtvanenāśu na drāgiti śaneśaneḥ  pauruṣeṇaiva yatnena pālayeccittabālakam  vāsanaughastvayā pūrvamabhyāsena ghanīkṛtaḥ  śubho vāpyaśubho vāpi śubhamadya ghanīkuru  prāgabhyāsavaśādyātā yadā te vāsanodayam  tadābhyāsasya sāphalyaṃ viddhi tvamarimardana  idānīmapi te yāti ghanatāṃ vāsanānagha  abhyāsavaśatastasmācchubhābhyāsamupāhara  pūrve ceddhanatāṃ yātā nābhyāsāttava vāsanā  vardhiṣyate tu nedānīmapi tāta sukhī bhava  saṃdigdhāyāmapi bhṛśaṃ śubhāmeva samāhara  asyāṃ tu vāsanāvṛddhau śubhāddoṣo na kaścana  yadyadabhyasyate loke tanmayenaiva bhūyate  ityākumāraṃ prājñeṣu dṛṣṭaṃ saṃdehavajitam  yūbhāsanā yuktastadatra bhava bhūtaye  paraṃ poruṣamāśritya vijityendriyapañcakam  avyutpannamanā yāvadbhavānajñātatatpadaḥ  guruśāstrapramāṇaistu nirṇītaṃ tāvadācara  tataḥ pakvakaṣāyeṇa nūnaṃ vijñātavastunā  śubhopyasautvayā tyājyo vāsanaugho nirādhinā  yadatisubhagamāryasevitaṃ cchubhamanusṛtya manojñabhāvabuddhyā  adhigamaya padaṃ sadā viśoka tadanu tadapyavamucya sādhu tiṣṭha  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  yathāsthitaṃ brahmatattvaṃ sattāniyatirucyate  sā vineturvinetṛtvaṃ sā vineyavineyatā  ataḥ pauruṣamāśritya śreyase nityabāndhavam  ekāgraṃ kuru taccittaṃ śṛṇu coktamidaṃ mama  avāntaranipātīni svārūḍhāni manoratham  pauruṣeṇendriyāṇyāśu saṃyamya samatāṃ naya  ihāmutra ca siddhyarthaṃ puruṣārthaphalapradām  mokṣopāyamayīṃ vakṣye saṃhitāṃ sāranirmitām  apunargrahaṇāyāntastyaktvā saṃsāravāsanām  saṃpūrṇau śamasaṃtoṣāvādāyodārayā dhiyā  sapūrvāparavākyārthavicāraviṣayāhatam  manaḥ samarasaṃ kṛtvā sānusaṃdhānamātmani  sukhaduḥkhakṣayakaraṃ mahānandekakāraṇam  mokṣopāyamimaṃ rāma vakṣyamāṇaṃ mayā śṛṇu  imāṃ mokṣakathāṃ śrutvā saha sarvairvivekibhiḥ  paraṃ yāsyasi nirduḥkhaṃ nāśo yatra na vidyate  idamuktaṃ purākalpe brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā  sarvaduḥkhakṣayakaraṃ paramāśvāsanaṃ śriyaḥ  śrīrāma uvāca  kenoktaṃ kāraṇenedaṃ brahmanpūrva svayaṃbhuvā  kathaṃ ca bhavatā prāptametatkathaya me prabho  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  astyanantavilāsātmā sarvagaḥ sarvasaṃśrayaḥ  cidākāśovināśātmā pradīpaḥ sarvajantuṣu  spandāspandasamākārāttato viṣṇurajāyata  syandamānarasāpūrāttaraṅgaḥ sāgarādiva  sumerukarṇikāttasya digdalāddhṛdayāmbujāt  tārakākesaravataḥ parameṣṭhī vyajāyata  vedavedārthaviddevamunimūṇḍalamaṇḍitaḥ  sosṛjatsakala saga vikalpaughaṃ yathā manaḥ  jambūdvūpisya koṇekhiravarṣe bhāratanāmani  sasaja janasargaudhaṃ hyādhivyādhipariplutam  bhāvābhāvaviṣaṇṇāṅgamutpātadhvasatatparam  sargesminbhūtajātīnā nānāvyasanasakulam  janasyaitasya duḥkhaṃ taddṛṣṭvā sakalalokakṛt  jagāma karuṇāmīśaḥ putraduḥkhātpitā yathā  ka eteṣāṃ hatāśānāṃ duḥkhasyānto hatāyuṣām  syāditi kṣaṇamekāgraṃ cintayāmāsa bhūtaye  iti saṃcintya bhagavānsasarja svayamīśvaraḥ  tapo dharma ca dānaṃ ca satyaṃ tīrthāni caiva hi  etatsṛṣṭvā punadavāścantayāmāsa bhūtakṛt  puṃsāṃ nānena sargasya duḥkhasyānta iti svayam  nirvāṇaṃ nāma paramaṃ sukhaṃ yena punarjanaḥ  na jāyate na mriyate tajjñānādeva labhyate  saṃsārottaraṇe jantorupāyo jñānameva hi  tapo dānaṃ tathā tīrthamanupāyāḥ prakīrtitāḥ  tattāvaduḥkhamokṣārtha janasyāsya hatātmanaḥ  pratyagraṃ taraṇopāyamāśu prakaṭayāmyaham  iti saṃcintya bhagavānbrahmā kamalasaṃsthitaḥ  manasā parisaṃkalpya māmutpāditavānimam  kutopyutpanna evāśu tatohaṃ samupasthitaḥ  pitustasya punaḥ śīghramūrmirūrmerivānagha  kamaṇḍaludharo nāthaḥ sakamaṇḍalunā mayā  sākṣamālaḥ sākṣamālaṃ sa praṇamyābhivāditaḥ  ehi putreti māmuktvā sa svābjasyottare dale  śuklāśca iva śītāṃśu yojayāmāsa pāṇinā  mṛgakṛttiparīdhāno mṛgakṛttinijāmbaram  māmuvāca pitā brahmā suhaṃsaḥ sārasaṃ yathā  muhūrtamātraṃ te putra ceto vānaracañcalam  ajñānamabhyāsraśatu śaśaḥ śaśadharaṃ yathā  iti tenāśu śaptaḥ sanvicārasamanantaram  ahaṃ vismṛtavānsarve svarūpamamalaṃ kila  athāhaṃ dīnatā yātaḥ sthitosaṃbuddhayā dhiyā  duḥkhaśokābhisaṃtapto jāto jana ivādhanaḥ  kaṣṭaṃ saṃsāranāmāyaṃ doṣaḥ kathamihāgataḥ  iti cintitavānantastūṣṇīmeva vyavasthitaḥ  athābhyadhātsa māṃ tātaḥ putra kiṃ duḥkhavānasi  duḥkhopaghātaṃ māṃ pṛccha sukhī nityaṃ bhaviṣyasi  tataḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sa bhagavānmayā sakalalokakṛt  hemapadmadalasthena saṃsāravyādhibheṣajam  kathaṃ nātha mahāduḥkhamayaḥ saṃsāra āgataḥ  kathaṃ ca kṣīyate jantoriti pṛṣṭena tena me  tajjñānaṃ subahu proktaṃ yajjñātvā pāvanaṃ param  ahaṃ piturabhiprāyaḥ kilādhika iva sthitaḥ  tato viditavedyaṃ māṃ nijāṃ prakṛtimāsthitam  sa uvāca jagatkartā vaktā sakalakāraṇam  śāpenājñapadaṃ nītvā pṛcchakastvaṃ mayā kṛtaḥ  putrāsya jñānasārasya samastajanasiddhaye  idānīṃ śāntaśāpastvaṃ paraṃ bodhamupāgataḥ  saṃsthitohamivaikānmākanaka kanakādivat  gacchedānīṃ mahīpṛṣṭhe jambūdvīpāntarasthitam  sādho bharatavarṣa tvaṃ lokānugrahahetunā  tatra kriyākāṇḍaparāstvayā putra mahādhiyā  upadeśvāḥ kriyākāṇḍakrameṇa kramaśālinā  virarktācettāśca tathā mahāprājñā vicāriṇaḥ  upadeśyāstvayā sādho jñānenānandadāyinā  iti tena niyuktohaṃ pitrā kamalayoninā  iha rāghava tiṣṭhāmi yāvadbhūtaparamparā  kartavyamasti na mameha hi kiṃcideva sthātavyamityatimanā bhuvi saṃsthitosmi  saṃśāntayā satatasuptadhiyeha vṛtyā kārya karomi na ca kiṃcidahaṃ karomi  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  etatte kathitaṃ sarva jñānāvataraṇaṃ bhuvi  mayā svamīhitaṃ ceva kamalodbhavaceṣṭitam  tadidaṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ śrotumadya tavānagha  bhṛśamutkaṇṭhitaṃ ceto mahataḥ sukṛtodayāt  śrīrāma uvāca  kathaṃ brahmanmagavato loke jñānāvatāraṇe  sargādanantaraṃ buddhiḥ pravṛttā parameṣṭhinaḥ  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  parame brahmaṇi brahmā svabhāvavaśataḥ svayam  jātaḥ spandamayo nityamūrmirambunidhāviva  dṛṣṭvaivamāturaṃ sarga sargasya sakalāṃ gatim  bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyasthāṃ daśa parameśvaraḥ  sakriyākramakālasya kṛtādeḥ kṣaya āgate  mohamālocya lokānāṃ kāruṇyamagamatprabhuḥ  tato māmīśvaraḥ sṛṣṭvā jñānenāyojya cāsakṛt  visasarja mahīpīṭhaṃ lokasyājñānaśāntaye  yathāhaṃ prahitastena tathānye ca maharṣayaḥ  sanatkumārapramukhā nāradādyāśca bhūriśaḥ  kriyākrameṇa puṇyena tathā jñānakrameṇa ca  manomohāmayonnaddhamuddhartuṃ lokamīritāḥ  maharṣibhistatastaistaiḥ kṣīṇe kṛtayuge purā  kramātkriyākrame śuddhe pṛthivyā tanutāṃ gate  kriyākramavidhānārthaṃ maryādāniyamāya ca  pṛthagdeśavibhāgena bhūpālāḥ parikalpitāḥ  bahūni smṛtiśāstrāṇi yajñaśāstrāṇi cāvanau  dharmakāmārthasiddhyarthaṃ kalpitānyucitānyatha  kālacakre vahatyasmiṃstato vigalite krame  pratyahaṃ bhojanapare jane śālyarjanonmukhe  dvandvāni saṃpravṛttāni viṣayārthe mahībhujām  daṇḍyatāṃ saṃprayātāni bhūtāni bhūvi bhūriśaḥ  tato yuddha vinā bhūpā mahī pālayituṃ kṣamāḥ  na samathostadā yātāḥ prajābhiḥ saha dainyatām  teṣāṃ dainyāpanodārthaṃ samyagdṛṣṭikramāya ca  tatosmadādibhiḥ proktā mahatyo jñānadṛṣṭayaḥ  adhyātmavidyā teneyaṃ pūrva rājasu varṇitā  tadanu prasṛtā loke rājavidyetyudāhṛtā  rājavidyā rājaguhyamadhyātmajñānamuttamam  jñātvā rāghava rājānaḥ parāṃ nirduḥkhatāṃ gatāḥ  atha rājasvatīteṣu bahuṣvamalakīrtiṣu  asmāddaśarathādrāma jātodya tvamihāvanau  tava cātiprasannesmiñjātaṃ manasi pāvanam  nirnimittamidaṃ cāru vairāgyamarimardana  sarvasyaiva hiṃ sarvasya sādhorrāṃpe vivekinaḥ  nimittapūrvaṃ vairāgyaṃ jāyate rāma rājasam  idaṃ tvapūrvamutpanna camatkārakaraṃ  tavānimittaṃ vairāgyaṃ sāttvikaṃ svavivekajam  bībhatsaṃ viṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā kau nāma na virajyate  satāmuttamavairāgya vivekādeva jāyate  te mahāntau mahāprājñā nimittena vinaiva hi  vairāgyaṃ jāyate yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ hyamalamānasam  svavivekacamatkāraparāmarśaviraktayā  rājate hi dhiyā janturyuveva varamālayā  parāmṛśya vivekenasaṃsāraracanāmimām  vairāgyaṃ yedhigacchanti ta eva puruṣottamāḥ  svavivekavaśādeva vicāryedaṃ punaḥpunaḥ  indrajālaṃ parityājyaṃ sabāhyābhyantaraṃ balāt  śmaśānamāpada dainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko na virajyate  tadvairāgyaṃ paraṃ śreyaḥ svato yadabhijāyate  akṛtrimavirāgatvaṃ mahattvamalamāgataḥ  yogyosi jñānasārasya bījasyeva mṛdusthalam  prasādātparameśasya nāthasya paramātmanaḥ  tvādṛśasya śubhā buddhirvivekamanudhāvati  kriyākrameṇa mahatā tapasā niyamena ca  dānena tīrthayātrābhiścirakālaṃ vivekataḥ  duṣkṛte kṣayamāpanne paramārthavicāraṇe  kākatālīyayogena buddhirjantoḥ pravartate  kriyāparāstāvadalaṃ cakrāvartibhirāvṛtāḥ  bhramantīha janā yāvanna paśyanti paraṃ padam  yathābhūtamidaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃsāraṃ tanmayīṃ dhiyam  parityajya paraṃ yānti nirālānā gajā iva  viṣameyamananteha rāma saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ  dehayukto mahājanturvinā jñānaṃ na paśyati  jñānayuktiplavenaiva saṃsārābdhiṃ sudustaram  mahādhiyaḥ samuttīrṇā nimeṣeṇa raghūdvaha  tāmimāṃ jñānayuktiṃ tvaṃ saṃsārāmbhodhitāriṇīm  śṛṇuṣvāvahito buddhyā nityāvahitayā tayā  yasmādanantasaṃrambhā jāgatyo duḥkhabhītayaḥ  cirāyāntardahantyetā vinā yuktimaninditām  śītavātātapādīni dvandvaduḥkhāni rāghava  jñānaśaktiṃ vinā kena sahyatāṃ yānti sādhuṣu  āpatanti pratipadaṃ yathākālaṃ dahanti ca  duḥkhacintā naraṃ mūḍhaṃ tṛṇamagniśikhā iva  prājñaṃ vijñātavijñeyaṃ samyagdarśanamādhayaḥ  na dahanti vanaṃ varṣāsiktamagniśikhā iva  ādhivyādhiparāvarte saṃsāramarumārute  kṣubhitepi na tattvajño bhajyate kalpavṛkṣavat  tattvaṃ jñātumato yatnāddhīmāneva hi dhīmatā  prāmāṇikaḥ prabuddhātmā praṣṭavyaḥ praṇayānvitam  prāmāṇikasya pṛṣṭasya vakturuttamacetasaḥ  yatnena vacanaṃ grāhyamaṃśukeneva kuṅkumam  atattvajñamanādeyavacanaṃ vāgvidāṃ vara  yaḥ pṛcchati naraṃ tasmānnāsti mūḍhataroparaḥ  prāmāṇikasya tajjñasya vaktuḥ pṛṣṭasya yatnataḥ  nānutiṣṭhati yo vākya nānyastasmānnarādhamaḥ  ajñatātajjñate pūrva vakturnirṇīya kāryataḥ  yaḥ karati naraḥ praśnaṃ pracchakaḥ sa mahāmatiḥ  anirṇīya pravaktāraṃ bālaḥ praśnaṃ karoti yaḥ  adhama pracchakaḥ sa syānna mahārthasya bhājanam  pūrvāparasamādhānakṣamabuddhāvanindite  pṛṣṭaṃ prājñena vaktavyaṃ nādhame paśudharmiṇi  prāmāṇikārthayogyatvaṃ pracchakasyāvicārya ca  yo vakti tamiha prājñāḥ prāhurmūḍhataraṃ naram  tvamatīva guṇaślāghī pracchako raghunandana  ahaṃ ca vaktuṃ jānāmi samo yogoyamāvayoṃ  yadahaṃ vacmi tadyatnāttvayā śabdārthakovida  etadvastviti nirṇīya hṛdi kāryamakhaṇḍitam  mahānasi viraktosi tattvajñosi janasthitau  tvayi coktaṃ lagatyantaḥ kuṅkumāmbu yathāṃśuke  uktāvadhānaparamā paramārthavivecinī  viśatyarthaṃ tava prajñā jalamadhyamivārkabhāḥ  yadyadvacmi tadādeyaṃ hṛdi kārya prayatnataḥ  nocetpraṣṭavya evāhaṃ na tvayeha nirarthakam  mano hi capalaṃ rāma saṃsāravanamarkaṭam  saṃśodhya hṛdi yatnena śrotavyā paramārthagīḥ  avivekinamajñānamasajjanaratiṃ janam  ciraṃ dūratare kṛtvā pūjanīyā hi sādhavaḥ  nityaṃ sajjanasaṃparkādviveka upajāyate  vivekapādapasyaiva bhogamokṣau phale smṛtau  mokṣadvāre dvārapālāścatvāraḥ parikīrtitāḥ  śamo vicāraḥ saṃtoṣaścaturthaḥ sādhusaṃgamaḥ  ete sevyāḥ prayatnena catvārau dvau trayothavā  dvāramuddhāṭayantyete mokṣarājagṛhe tathā  ekaṃ vā sarvayatnena prāṇāṃstyaktvā samāśrayet  ekasminvaśage yānti catvāropi vaśaṃ yataḥ  saviveko hi śāstrasya jñānasya tapasaḥ śruteḥ  bhājanaṃ bhūṣaṇākāro bhāskarastejasāmiva  ghanataṣapayātaṃ hi prajñāmāndyamacetasām  yāti sthāvaratāmambu jāḍyātpāṣāṇatāmiva  tvaṃ tu rāghava saujanyaguṇaśāstrārthadṛṣṭibhiḥ  vikāsitāntaḥkaraṇaḥ sthitaḥ padma ivodaye  imāṃ jñānagiraṃ śrotumavaboddhaṃ ca sanmate  arhasyuddhatakarṇastvaṃ janturvīṇāsvanaṃ yathā  vairāgyābhyāsayogena samasaujanyasaṃpadām  arjanāṃ kurutāṃ rāma yatra nāśo na vidyate  śāstrasajjanasaṃsargapūrvakaiḥ satapodamaiḥ  ādau saṃsāramuktyartha prajñāmevābhivardhayet  etadevāsya mauryasya paramaṃ viddhi nāśanam  yadidaṃ prekṣyate śāstraṃ kiṃcitsaṃskṛtayā dhiyā  saṃsāraviṣavṛkṣoyamekamāspadamāpadām  ajñaṃ saṃmohayennityaṃ maurkhya yatnena nāśayet  durāśāsarpagatyena maurkhyeṇa hṛdi valgatā  cetaḥ saṃkocamāyāti carmāgnāviva yojitam  prājñe yathārthabhūteyaṃ vastudṛṣṭiḥ prasīdati  dṛgivendau nirambhode sakalāmalamaṇḍale  pūryāpavicārārthaścāstvāturyaśālinī  savikāsā matiryasya sa pumāniha kathyate  vikasitena sitena tamomucā varavicāraṇaśītalarociṣā  guṇavatā hṛdayena virājase tvamamalena nabhaḥ śaśinā yathā  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  paripūrṇamanā mānyaḥ praṣṭuṃ jānāsi rāghava  vetsi coktaṃ ca tenāhaṃ pravṛtto vaktumādarāt  rajastamobhyāṃ rahitā śuddhasattvānupātinīm  matimātmani saṃsthāpya jñānaṃ śrotuṃ sthirau bhava  vidyate tvayi sarvaiva pracchakasya guṇāvalī  vakturguṇāścaiva mayi ratnaśrīrjaladhau yathā  āptavānasi vairāgyaṃ vivekāsaṅgajaṃ suta  candrakānta ivārdratvaṃ lagnacandrakarotkaraḥ  ciramāśaiśavādeva tavābhyāsosti sadguṇaiḥ  śuddhaiḥ śuddhasya dīrghaiśca padmasyevātisaṃtataiḥ  ataḥ śṛṇu kathāṃ vakṣye tvamevāsyā hi bhājanam  na hi candraṃ vinā śuddhā savikāsā kumudvatī  ye kecana samārambhā yāśca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ  te ca tāśca pade dṛṣṭe niḥśeṣe yānti vai śamam  yadi vijñānaviśrāntirna bhavedbhavyacetasaḥ  tadasyāṃ saṃsṛtau sādhuścintāmauḍhyaṃ saheta kaḥ  paraṃ prāpya vilīyante sarvā mananavṛttayaḥ  kalpāntārkagaṇāsaṅgātkulaśailaśilā iva  duḥsahā rāma saṃsāraviṣāveśaviṣūcikā  yogagāruḍamantreṇa pāvanena praśāmyati  sa ca yogaḥ sajjanena saha śāstravicāraṇāt  paramārthajñānamantro nūnaṃ labhyata eva ca  avaśyamiha hi vicāre kṛte sakaladuḥkhaparikṣayo bhavatīti mantavyaṃ nāto vicāradṛṣṭayovahelayā draṣṭavyāḥ  vicāravatā puruṣeṇa sakalamidamādhipañjaraṃ sarpeṇa tvacamiva paripakvāṃ saṃtyajya vigatajvareṇa śītalāntaḥkaraṇena vinodādindrajālamiva jagadakhilamālokyate samyagdarśanavatā asamyagdarśanavato hi paraṃ duḥkhamidam  viṣamo hyatitarāṃ saṃsārarāgo bhogīva daśati asiriva cchinatti kunta iva vedhayati rajjurivāveṣṭayati pāvaka iva dahati rātririvāndhayati aśaṅkitaparipatitapuruṣānpāṣāṇa iva vivaśīkaroti harati prajñāṃ nāśayati sthitiṃ pātayati mohāndhakūpe tṛṣṇā jarjarīkaroti na tadasti kiṃcidduḥkhaṃ saṃsārī yanna prāpnoti  duranteyaṃ kila viṣayaviṣūcikā yadi na cikitsyate tannitarāṃ narakanagaranikaraphalānubandhinī tattatkaroti  yatra śilāśitāsiśātaḥ pāta upalatāḍanamagnidāho himāvasekoṅgāvakartanaṃ candanacarcātaruvanāni ghuṇavṛttāntaḥpariveṣoṅgaparimārjanamanavaratānalavicalitasamaranārācanipāto nidāghavinodanaṃ dhārāgṛhasīkaravarṣaṇaṃ śiraśchedaḥ sukhanidrāmūkīkaraṇamānanamudrābāndhurya mahānupacayaḥ  tadevaṃvidhakaṣṭaceṣṭāsahasradāruṇe saṃsāracalayantresmin rāghava nāvahelanā kartavyā avaśyameva vidhāraṇīyamevaṃ cāvaboddhavyaṃ yathā kila śāstravicārācchreyo bhavatīti  anyasya raghukulendo yadi caite mahāmunayo maharṣayaśca viprāśca rājānaśca jñānakavacenāvaguṇṭhitaśarīrāste kathamaduḥkhakṣamā api duḥkhakarīṃ tāṃ tāṃ vṛttipūrvikāṃ saṃsārakadarthanāmanubhavantaḥ satatameva muditamanasastiṣṭhanti  iha hi  vikautukā vigatavikalpaviplavā yathā sthitā hariharapadmajādayaḥ  narottamāḥ samadhigatātmadīpakāstathā sthitā jagati viśuddhabuddhayaḥ  parikṣīṇe mohe vigalati ghane jñānajalade parijñāte tattve samadhigata ātmanyatitate  vicāryāryaiḥ sārdhaṃ calitavapuṣo vai sadṛśato dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇamaṭanaṃ jāgatamidam  anyacca rāghava  prasanne cittattve hṛdi śamabhave valgati pare śamābhogībhūtāsvakhilakalanādṛṣṭiṣu puraḥ  samaṃ yāti svāntaḥkaraṇaghaṭanāsvāditarasaṃ dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattve ramaṇamaṭanaṃ jāgatamidam  anyacca  rathaḥ sthāṇurdehasturagaracanā cendriyagatiḥ parispando vāto vahanakalitānandaviṣayaḥ  paroṇurvā dehī jagati viharāmītyanaghayā dhiyā dṛṣṭe tattveramaṇamaṭanaṃ jāgatamidam  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  etāṃ dṛṣṭimavaṣṭabhya dṛṣṭātmānaḥ subuddhayaḥ  vicarantīha saṃsāre mahāntobhyuditā iva  na śocanti na vāñchanti na yācante śubhāśubham  sarvameva ca kurvanti na kurvantīha kiṃcana  svacchamevāvatiṣṭhante svacchaṃ kurvanti yānti hi  heyopādeyatāpakṣarahitāḥ svātmani sthitāḥ  āyānti ca na cāyānti prayānti ca na yānti ca  kurvantyapi na kurvanti na vadanti vadanti ca  ye kecana samārambhā yāśca kāścana dṛṣṭayaḥ  heyopādeyatastāstāḥ kṣīyantedhigate pade  parityaktasamastehaṃ manomadhuravṛttimat  sarvataḥ sukhamabhyeti candrabimba iva sthitam  api nirmananārambhamavyastākhilakautukam  ātmanyeva na mātyantarindāviva rasāyanam  na karotīndrajālāni nānudhāvati vāsanām  bālacāpalamutsṛjya pūrvameva virājate  evaṃvidhā hi vṛttaya ātmatattvāvalokanāllabhyante nānyathā  tasmādvicāreṇātmaivānveṣṭavya upāsanīyo jñātavyo yāvajjīvaṃ puruṣeṇa netaraditi  svānubhūteśca śāstrasya guroścaivaikavākyatā  yasyābhyāsena tenātmā santatenāvalokyate  avahelitaśāstrārthairavajñātamahājanaiḥ  kaṣṭāmapyāpadaṃ prāpto na mūḍhaiḥ samatāmiyāt  na vyādhirna viṣaṃ nāpattathā nādhiśca bhūtale  khedāya svaśarīrasthaṃ maurkhyamekaṃ yathā nṛṇām  kiṃcitsaṃskṛtabuddhīnāṃ śrutaṃ śāstramidaṃ yathā  maurkhyāpahaṃ tathā śāstramanyadasti na kiṃcana  idaṃ śrāvyaṃ sukhakaraṃ yathā dṛṣṭāntasundaram  aviruddhamaśeṣeṇa śāstraṃ vākyārthabandhunā  āpado yā duruttārā yāśca tucchāḥ kuyonayaḥ  tāstā maurkhyātprasūyante khadirādiva kaṇṭakāḥ  varaṃ śarāvahastasya cāṇḍālāgāravīthiṣu  bhikṣārthamaṭanaṃ rāma na maurkhyahatajīvitam  varaṃ ghorāndhakūpeṣu koṭareṣveva bhūruhām  andhakīṭatvamekānte na maurkhyamatiduḥkhadam  imamālokamāsādya mokṣopāyamayaṃ janaḥ  andhatāmeti na punaḥ kaścinmohatamasyapi  tāvannayati saṃkocaṃ tṛṣṇā vai mānavāmbujam  yāvadvivekasūryasya noditā vimalā prabhā  saṃsāraduḥkhamokṣārthe mādṛśaiḥ saha bandhubhiḥ  svarūpamātmano jñātvā guruśāstrapramāṇataḥ  jīvanmuktāścarantīha yathā hariharādayaḥ  yathā brahmarṣayaścānye tathā vihara rāghava  anantānīha duḥkhāni sukhaṃ tṛṇalavopamam  nātaḥ sukheṣu badhnīyāddṛṣṭiṃ duḥkhānubandhiṣu  yadanantamanāyāsaṃ tatpadaṃ sārasiddhaye  sādhanīyaṃ prayatnena puruṣeṇa vijānatā  ta eva puruṣārthasya bhājanaṃ puruṣottamāḥ  anuttamapadālambi mano yeṣāṃ gatajvaram  saṃbhogāśanamātreṇa rājyādiṣu sukheṣu ye  saṃtuṣṭā duṣṭamanaso viddhi tānandhadardurān  ye śaṭheṣu duranteṣu duṣkṛtārambhaśāliṣu  dviṣatsu mitrarūpeṣu bhaktā vai bhogabhogiṣu  te yānti durgamāddurgaṃ duḥkhādduḥkhaṃ bhayādbhayam  narakānnarakaṃ mūḍhā mohamantharabuddhayaḥ  parasparavināśokteḥ śreyaḥstho na kadācana  sukhaduḥkhadaśe rāma taḍitprasarabhaṅgure  ye viraktā mahātmānaḥ suviviktā bhavādṛśāḥ  puruṣānviddhi tānvandyānbhogamokṣaikabhājanān  vivekaṃ paramāśritya vairāgyābhyāsayogataḥ  saṃsārasaritaṃ ghorāmimāmāpadamuttaret  na svaptavyaṃ ca saṃsāramāyāsviha vijānatā  viṣamūrcchanasaṃmohadāyinīṣu vivekinā  saṃsāramimamāsādya yastiṣṭhatyavahelayā  jvalitasya gṛhasyoccaiḥ śete tārṇasya saṃstare  yatprāpya na nivartante yadāsādya na śocati  tatpadaṃ śemuṣīlabhyamastyevātra na saṃśayaḥ  nāsti cettadvicāreṇa doṣaḥ ko bhavatāṃ bhavet  asti cettatsamuttīrṇā bhaviṣyatha bhavārṇavāt  pravṛttiḥ puruṣasyeha mokṣopāyavicāraṇe  yadā bhavatyāśu tadā mokṣabhāgī sa ucyate  anapāyi nirāśaṅkaṃ svāsthyaṃ vigatavibhramam  na vinā kevalībhāvādvidyate bhuvanatraye  tatprāptāvuttamaprāptau na kleśa upajāyate  na dhanānyupakurvanti na mitrāṇi na bāndhavāḥ  na hastapādacalanaṃ na deśāntarasaṃgamaḥ  na kāyakleśavaidhuryaṃ na tīrthāyatanāśrayāḥ  puruṣārthaikasādhyena vāsanaikārthakarmaṇā  kevalaṃ tanmanomātrajayenāsādyate padam  vivekamātrasādhyaṃ tadvicāraikāntaniścayam  tyajatā duḥkhajālāni nareṇaitadavāpyate  sukhasevyāsanasthena tadvicārayatā svayam  na śocyate padaṃ prāpya na sa bhūyo hi jāyate  tatsamastasukhāsārasīmāntaṃ sādhavo viduḥ  tadanuttamaniṣpandaṃ paramāhū rasāyanam  kṣayitvātsarvabhāvānāṃ svargamānuṣyayordvayoḥ  sukhaṃ nāstyeva salilaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāsvivaitayoḥ  ato manojayaścintyaḥ śamasaṃtoṣasādhanaḥ  anantasamasaṃyogastasmādānanda āpyate  tiṣṭhatā gacchatā caiva patatā bhramatā tathā  rakṣasā dānavenāpi devena puruṣeṇa vā  manaḥ praśamanodbhūttaṃ tatprāpyaṃ paramaṃ sukham  vikāsiśamapuṣpasya vivekoccataroḥ phalam  vyavahārapareṇāpi kāryavṛndamavindatā  bhānunevāmbarasthena nojjhyate na ca vāñchayate  manaḥpraśāntamatyacchaṃ viśrāntaṃ vigatabhramam  anīhaṃ vigatābhīṣṭaṃ nābhivāñchati nojjhati  mokṣadvāre dvārapālānimāñchraṇu yathākramam  yeṣāmekatamāsaktyā mokṣadvāraṃ praviśyate  sukhadoṣadaśādīrghā saṃsāramarumaṇḍalī  jantoḥ śītalatāmeti śītaraśmeḥ samaprabhā  śamenāsādyate śreyaḥ śamo hi paramaṃ padam  śamaḥ śivaḥ śamaḥ śānti śamo bhrāntinivāraṇam  puṃsaḥ praśamatṛptasya śītalācchatarātmanaḥ  śamabhūṣitacittasya śatrurapyeti mitratām  śamacandramasā yeṣāmāśayaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ  kṣīrodānāmivodeti teṣāṃ paramaśuddhatā  hṛtkuśeśayakośeṣu yeṣāṃ śamakuśeśayam  satāṃ vikasitaṃ te hi dvihṛtpadmāḥ samā hareḥ  śamaśrīḥ śobhate yeṣāṃ mukhendāvakalaṅkite  te kulīnendavo vandyāḥ saundaryavijitendriyāḥ  trailokyodaravartinyo nānandāya tathā śriyaḥ  sāmrājyasaṃpatpratimā yathā śamavibhūtayaḥ  yāni duḥkhāni yā tṛṣṇā duḥsahā ye durādhayaḥ  tatsarvaṃ śāntacetaḥsu tamorkeṣviva naśyati  mano hi sarvabhūtānāṃ prasādamadhigacchati  na tathendoryathā śānte jane janitakautukam  śamaśālini sauhārdavati sarveṣu jantuṣu  sujane paramaṃ tattvaṃ svayameva prasīdati  mātarīva paraṃ yānti viṣamāṇi mṛdūni ca  viśvāsamiha bhūtāni sarvāṇi śamaśālini  na rasāyanapānena na lakṣmyāliṅganena ca  tathā sukhamavāpnoti śamenāntaryathā manaḥ  sarvādhivyādhicalitaṃ krāntaṃ tṛṣṇāvaratrayā  manaḥ śamāmṛtāsekaiḥ samāśvāsaya rāghava  yatkaroṣi yadaśnāsi śamaśītalayā dhiyā  tatrātisvadate svādu netarattāta mānase  śamāmṛtarasācchannaṃ mano yāmeti nirvṛtim  chinnānyapi tayāṅgāni manye rohanti rāghava  na piśācā na rakṣāṃsi na daityā na ca śatravaḥ  na ca vyāghrabhujaṅgā vā dviṣanti śamaśālinam  susaṃnaddhasamastāṅgaṃ praśamāmṛtavarmaṇā  vedhayanti na duḥkhāni śarā vajraśilāmiva  na tathā śobhate rājā apyantaḥpurasaṃsthitaḥ  samayā svacchayā buddhyā yathopaśamaśīlayā  prāṇātpriyataraṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭimeti na vai janaḥ  yāmāyāti janaḥ śāntimavalokya śamāśayam  samayā śamaśālinyā vṛttyā yaḥ sādhu vartate  abhinanditayā loke jīvatīha sa netaraḥ  anuddhatamanāḥ śāntaḥ sādhuḥ karma karoti yat  tatsarvamabhinandanti tasyemā bhūtajātayaḥ  śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā śubhāśubham  na hṛṣyati glāyati yaḥ sa śānta iti kathyate  yaḥ samaḥ sarvabhūteṣu bhāvi kāṅkṣati nojjhati  jitvendriyāṇi yatnena sa śānta iti kathyate  spṛṣṭvāvadātayā buddhyā yathaivāntastathā bahiḥ  dṛśyante yatra kāryāṇi sa śānta iti kathyate  tuṣārakarabimbābhaṃ mano yasya nirākulam  maraṇotsavayuddheṣu sa śānta iti kathyate  sthitopi na sthita iva na hṛṣyati na kupyati  yaḥ suṣuptasamaḥ svasthaḥ sa śānta iti kathyate  amṛtasyandasubhagā yasya sarvajanaṃ prati  dṛṣṭiḥ prasarati prītā sa śānta iti kathyate  yontaḥ śītalatāṃ yāto yo bhāveṣu na majjati  vyavahārī na saṃmūḍhaḥ sa śānta iti kathyate  apyāpatsu durantāsu kalpānteṣu mahatsvapi  tucchehaṃ na mano yasya sa śānta iti kathyate  ākāśasadṛśī yasya puṃsaḥ saṃvyavahāriṇaḥ  kalaṅkameti na matiḥ sa śānta iti kathyate  tapasviṣu bahujñeṣu yājakeṣu nṛpeṣu ca  balavatsu guṇāḍhyeṣu śamavāneva rājate  śamasaṃsaktamanasāṃ mahatāṃ guṇaśālinām  udeti nirvṛtiścittājjyotsneva sitarociṣaḥ  sīmānto guṇapūgānāṃ pauruṣaikāntabhūṣaṇam  saṃkaṭeṣu bhayasthāne śamaḥ śrīmānvirājate  śamamamṛtamahāryamāryaguptaṃ paramavalambya paraṃ padaṃ prayātāḥ  raghutanaya yathā mahānubhāvāḥ kramamanupālaya siddhaye tameva  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  śāstrāvabodhāmalayā dhiyā paramapūtayā  kartavyaḥ kāraṇajñena vicāroniśamātmanaḥ  vicārāttīkṣṇatāmetya dhīḥ paśyati paraṃ padam  dīrghasaṃsārarogasya vicāro hi mahauṣadham  āpadvanamanantehāparipallavitākṛti  vicārakrakacacchinnaṃ naiva bhūyaḥ prarohati  mohena bandhunāśeṣu saṃkaṭeṣu śameṣu ca  sarvaṃ vyāptaṃ mahāprājña vicāro hi satāṃ gatiḥ  na vicāraṃ vinā kaścidupāyosti vipaścitām  vicārādaśubhaṃ tyaktvā śubhamāyāti dhīḥ satām  balaṃ buddhiśca tejaśca pratipattiḥ kriyāphalam  phalantyetāni sarvāṇi vicāreṇaiva dhīmatām  yuktāyuktamahādīpamabhivāñchitasādhakam  sphāraṃ vicāramāśritya saṃsārajaladhiṃ taret  ālūnahṛdayāmbhojānmahāmohamataṅgajān  vidārayati śuddhātmā vicāro nāma kesarī  mūḍhāḥ kālavaśeneha yadgatāḥ paramaṃ padam  tadvicārapradīpasya vijṛmbhitamanuttamam  rājyāni saṃpadaḥ sphārā bhogo mokṣaśca śāśvataḥ  vicārakalpavṛkṣasya phalānyetāni rāghava  yā vivekavikāsinyo matayo mahatāmiha  na tā vipadi majjanti tumbakānīva vāriṇi  vicārodayakāriṇyā dhiyā vyavaharanti ye  phalānāmatyudārāṇāṃ bhājanaṃ hi bhavanti te  mūrkhahṛtkānanasthānāmāśāprathamarodhinām  avicārakarañjānāṃ mañjaryo duḥkharītayaḥ  kajjalakṣodamalinā madirāmadadharmiṇī  avicāramayī nidrā yātu te rāghava kṣayam  mahāpadatidīrgheṣu sadvicāraparo naraḥ  na nimajjati moheṣu tejorāśistamaḥsviva  mānase sarasi svacche vicārakamalotkaraḥ  nūnaṃ vikasito yasya himavāniva bhāti saḥ  vicāravikalā yasya matirmāndyamupeyuṣaḥ  tasyodetyaśaniścandrānmudhā yakṣaḥ śiśoriva  duḥkhakhaṇḍakamasthūlaṃ vipannavalatāmadhuḥ  rāma dūre parityājyo nirviveko narādhamaḥ  ye kecana durārambhā durācārā durādhayaḥ  avicāreṇa te bhānti vetālāstamasā yathā  avicāriṇamekāntavanadrumasadharmakam  akṣamaṃ sādhukāryeṣu dūre kuru raghūdvaha  viviktaṃ hi mano jantorāśāvaivaśyavarjitam  parāṃ nirvṛtimabhyeti pūrṇacandra ivātmani  vivekitoditā dehe sarvaṃ śītalayatyalam  alaṃkaroti cātyantaṃ jyotsneva bhuvanaṃ yathā  paramārthapatākāyā dhiyo dhavalacāmaram  vicāro rājate janto rajanyāmiva candramāḥ  vicāracāravo jīvā bhāsayanto diśo daśa  bhānti bhāskaravannūnaṃ bhūyo bhavabhayāpahāḥ  bālasya svamanomohakalpitaḥ prāṇahārakaḥ  rātrau nabhasi vetālo vicāreṇa vilīyate  sarvaṃ eva jagadbhāvā avicāreṇa cāravaḥ  avidyamānasadbhāvā vicāraviśarāravaḥ  puṃso nijamanomohakalpitonalpaduḥkhadaḥ  saṃsāraciravetālo vicāreṇa vilīyate  samaṃ sukhaṃ nirābādhamanantamanapāśrayam  viddhīmaṃ kevalībhāvaṃ vicāroccataroḥ phalam  acalasthititodārā prakaṭābhogatejasā  tena niṣkāmatodeti śītatevendunoditā  svavicāramahauṣadhyā sādhuścittaniṣaṇṇayā  tayottamatvapradayā nābhivāñchati nojjhati  tatpadālambanaṃ cetaḥ sphāramābhāsamāgatam  nāstameti na codeti khamivātitatāntaram  na dadāti na cādatte na connamati śāmyati  kevalaṃ sākṣivatpaśyañjagadābhogi tiṣṭhati  na ca śāmyati nāpyantarnāpi bāhyevatiṣṭhati  na ca naiṣkarmyamādatte na ca karmaṇi majjati  upekṣate gataṃ vastu saṃprāptamanuvartate  na kṣubdho na ca vākṣubdho bhāti pūrṇa ivārṇavaḥ  evaṃ pūrṇena manasā mahātmāno mahāśayāḥ  jīvanmuktā jagatyasminviharantīha yoginaḥ  uṣitvā suciraṃ kālaṃ dhīrāste yāvadīpsitam  te tamante parityajya yānti kevalatāṃ tatām  kohaṃ kasya ca saṃsāra ityāpadyapi dhīmatā  cintanīyaṃ prayatnena sapratīkāramātmanā  kāryasaṃkaṭasaṃdehaṃ rājā jānāti rāghava  niṣphalaṃ saphalaṃ vāpi vicāreṇaiva nānyathā  vedavedāntasriddhāntasthitayaḥ sthitikāraṇam  nirṇīyante vicāreṇa dīpena ca bhuvo niśi  anaṣṭamandhakāreṣu bahutejaḥsvajihmitam  paśyatyapi vyavahitaṃ vicāraścārulocanam  vivekāndho hi jātyandhaḥ śocyaḥ sarvasya durmatiḥ  divyacakṣurvivekātmā jayatyakhilavastuṣu  paramātmamayī mānyā mahānandaikasādhinī  kṣaṇamekaṃ parityājyā na vicāracamatkṛtiḥ  vicāracārupuruṣo mahatāmapi rocate  paripakvacamatkāraṃ sahakāraphalaṃ yathā  vicārakāntamatayo nānekeṣu punaḥpunaḥ  luṭhanti duḥkhaśvabhreṣu jñātādhvagatayo narāḥ  naca rauti tathā rogī nānarthaśatajarjaraḥ  avicāravinaṣṭātmā yathājñaḥ pariroditi  varaṃ kardamamekatvaṃ malakīṭakatā varam  varamandhaguhāhitvaṃ na narasyāvicāritā  sarvānarthanijāvāsaṃ sarvasādhutiraskṛtam  sarvadausthityasīmāntamavicāraṃ parityajet  nityaṃ vicārayuktena bhavitavyaṃ mahātmanā  tathāndhakūpe patatāṃ vicāro hyavalambanam  svayamevātmanātmānamavaṣṭabhya vicārataḥ  saṃsāramohajaladhestārayetsvamanomṛgam  kohaṃ kathamayaṃ doṣaḥ saṃsārākhya upāgataḥ  nyāyeneti parāmarśo vicāra iti kathyate  andhāndhamohasudhanaṃ ciraṃ duḥkhāya kevalam  kṛtaṃ śilāyā hṛdayaṃ durmateścāvicāriṇaḥ  bhāvābhāvagrahotsargadṛśāmiha hi rāghava  na vicārādṛte tattvaṃ jñāyate sādhu kiṃcana  vicārājjñāyate tattvaṃ tattvādviśrāntirātmani  ato manasi śāntatvaṃ sarvaduḥkhaparikṣayaḥ  saphalatā phalate bhuvi karmaṇāṃ prakaṭatāṃ kila gacchati uttamām  sphuṭavicāradṛśaiva vicāritā śamavate bhavate ca virocatām  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  saṃtoṣo hi paraṃ śreyaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ sukhamucyate saṃtuṣṭaḥ paramabhyeti viśrāmamarisūdana  saṃtoṣaiśvaryasukhināṃ ciraviśrāntacetasām  sāmrājyamapi śāntānāṃ jarattṛṇalavāyate  saṃtoṣaśālinī buddhī rāma saṃsāravṛttiṣu  viṣamāsvapyanudvignā na kadācana hīyate  saṃtoṣāmṛtapānena ye śāntāstṛptimāgatāḥ  bhogaśrīratulā teṣāmeṣā prativiṣāyate  na tathā sukhayantyetāḥ pīyūṣarasavīcayaḥ  yathātimadhurāsvādaḥ saṃtoṣo doṣanāśanaḥ  aprāptavāñchāmutsṛjya saṃprāpte samatāṃ gataḥ  adṛṣṭakhedākhedo yaḥ sa saṃtuṣṭa ihocyate  ātmanātmani saṃtoṣaṃ yāvadyāti na mānasam  udbhavantyāpadastāvallatā iva manobilāt  saṃtoṣaśītalaṃ cetaḥ śuddhavijñānadṛṣṭibhiḥ  bhṛśaṃ vikāsamāyāti sūryāṃśubhirivāmbujam  āśāvaivaśyavivaśe citte saṃtoṣavarjite  mlāne vakramivādarśe na jñānaṃ pratibimbati  ajñānaghanayāminyā saṃkocaṃ na narāmbujam  yātyasāvudito yasya nityaṃ saṃtoṣabhāskaraḥ  akiṃcanopyasau jantuḥ sāmrājyasukhamaśnute  ādhivyādhivinirmuktaṃ saṃtuṣṭaṃ yasya mānasam  nābhivāñchatyasaṃprāptaṃ prāptaṃ bhuṃkte yathākramam  yaḥ susaumyasamācāraḥ saṃtuṣṭa iti kathyate  saṃtuṣṭiparatṛptasya mahataḥ pūrṇacetasaḥ  kṣīrābdheriva śuddhasya mukhe lakṣmīrvirājate  pūrṇatāmalamāśritya svātmanyevātmanā svayam  pauruṣeṇa prayatnena tṛṣṇāṃ sarvatra varjayet  saṃtoṣāmṛtapūrṇasya śāntaśītalayā dhiyā  svayaṃ sthairyaṃ mano yāti śītāṃśoriva śāśvatam  saṃtoṣapuṣṭamanasaṃ bhṛtyā iva maharddhayaḥ  rājānamupatiṣṭhanti kiṃkaratvamupāgatāḥ  ātmanaivātmani svasthe saṃtuṣṭe puruṣe sthite  praśāmyantyādhayaḥ sarve prāvṛṣīvāśu pāṃśavaḥ  nityaṃ śītalayā rāma kulaṅkaparibhinnayā  puruṣaḥ śuddhayā vṛttyā bhāti pūrṇatayenduvat  samatāsundaraṃ vakraṃ puruṣasyāvalokayan  toṣameti yathā loko na tathā dhanasaṃcayaiḥ  samatayā matayā guṇaśālināṃ puruṣarāḍiha yaḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ  tamamalaṃ praṇamanti nabhaścarā api mahāmunayo raghunandana  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  viśeṣeṇa mahābuddhe saṃsārottaraṇe nṛṇām  sarvatropakarotīha sādhuḥ sādhusamāgamaḥ  sādhusaṅgatarorjātaṃ vivekakusumaṃ sitam  rakṣanti ye mahātmāno bhājanaṃ te phalaśriyaḥ  śūnyamākīrṇatāmeti mṛtirapyutsavāyate  āpatsaṃpadivābhāti vidvajjanasamāgame  himamāpatsarojinyā mohanīhāramārutaḥ  jayatyeko jagatyasminsādhuḥ sādhusamāgamaḥ  paraṃ vivardhanaṃ buddherajñānataruśātanam  samutsāraṇamādhīnāṃ viddhi sādhusamāgamam  vivekaḥ paramo dīpo jāyate sādhusaṃgamāt  manoharojjvalo nūnamāsekādiva gucchakaḥ  nirapāyāṃ nirābādhāṃ nirvṛtiṃ nityapīvarīm  anuttamāṃ prayacchanti sādhusaṅgavibhūtayaḥ  api kaṣṭatarāṃ prāptairdaśāṃ vivaśatāṃ gataiḥ  manāgapi na saṃtyājyā mānavaiḥ sādhusaṃgatiḥ  sādhusaṃgatayo loke sanmārgasya ca dīpikāḥ  hārdāndhakārahāriṇyo bhāso jñānavivasvataḥ  yaḥ snātaḥ śītasitayā sādhusaṃgatigaṅgayā  kiṃ tasya dānaiḥ kiṃ tīrthaiḥ kiṃ tapobhiḥ kimadhvaraiḥ  nīrāgāśchinnasaṃdehā galitagranthayonagha  sādhavo yadi vidyante kiṃ tapastīrthasaṃgrahaiḥ  viśrāntamanaso dhanyāḥ prayatnena pareṇa hi  daridreṇeva maṇayaḥ prekṣaṇīyā hi sādhavaḥ  satsamāgamasaundaryaśālinī dhīmatāṃ matiḥ  kamalevāpsarovṛnde sarvadaiva virājate  tenāmalavicārasya padasyāgrāvacūlitā  prathitā yena dhanyena na tyaktā sādhusaṃgatiḥ  vicchinnagranthayastajjñāḥ sādhavaḥ sarvasaṃmatāḥ  sarvopāyena saṃsevyāste hyupāyā bhavāmbudhau  te ete narakāgnīnāṃ saṃśuṣkendhanatāṃ gatāḥ  yairdṛṣṭā helayā santo narakānalavāridāḥ  dāridryaṃ maraṇaṃ duḥkhamityādiviṣayo bhramaḥ  saṃpraśāmyatyaśeṣeṇa sādhusaṃgamabheṣajaiḥ  saṃtoṣaḥ sādhusaṅgaśca vicārotha śamastathā  eta eva bhavāmbhodhāvupāyāstaraṇe nṛṇām  saṃtoṣaḥ paramo lābhaḥ satsaṅgaḥ paramā gatiḥ  vicāraḥ paramaṃ jñānaṃ śamo hi paramaṃ sukham  catvāra ete vimalā upāyā bhavabhedane  yairabhyastāsta uttīrṇā mohavāribhavārṇavāt  ekasminneva vai teṣāmabhyaste vimalodaye  catvāropi kilābhyastā bhavanti sudhiyāṃ vara  ekopyekopi sarveṣāmeṣāṃ prasavabhūriha  sarvasaṃsiddhaye tasmātyatnenaikaṃ samāśrayet  satsamāgamasaṃtoṣavicārāḥ suvicāritam  pravartante śamasvacche vāhanānīva sāgare  vicārasaṃtoṣaśamasatsamāgamaśālini  pravartante śriyo jantau kalpavṛkṣāśrite yathā  vicāraśamasatsaṅgasaṃtoṣavati mānave  pravartante prapūrṇendau saundaryādyā guṇā iva  satsaṅgasaṃtoṣaśamavicāravati sanmatau  pravartante mantrivare rājanīva jayaśriyaḥ  tasmādekatamaṃ nityameteṣāṃ raghunandana  pauruṣeṇa mano jitvā yatnenābhyāharedguṇam  paraṃ pauruṣamāśritya jitvā cittamataṅgajam  yāvadeko guṇo nāntastāvannāstyuttamā gatiḥ  pauruṣeṇa prayatnena dantairdantānvicūrṇayet  yāvannābhiniviṣṭaṃ te mano rāma guṇārjane  devo bhavātha yakṣo vā puruṣaḥ pādapotha vā  tāvattava mahābāho nopāyostīha kaścana  ekasminneva phalade guṇe balamupāgate  kṣīyante sarva evāśu doṣā vivaśacetasaḥ  guṇe vivṛddhe vardhante guṇā doṣajayapradāḥ  doṣe vivṛddhe vardhante doṣā guṇavināśanāḥ  manomohavane hyasminveginī vāsanāsarit  śubhāśubhabṛhatkūlā nityaṃ vahati jantuṣu  sā hi svena prayatnena yasminneva nipātyate  kūle tenaiva vahati yathecchasi tathā kuru  puruṣayatnajavena manovane śubhataṭānugatāṃ kramaśaḥ kuru  varamate nijabhāvamahānadīmahaha tena manāgapi nohyase  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  evamantarviveko yaḥ sa mahāniha rāghava  yogyo jñānagiraḥ śrotuṃ rājeva nayabhāratīm  avadātovadātasya vicārasya mahāśayaḥ  jaḍasaṅgojjhito yogyaḥ śaradindoryathā nabhaḥ  tvametayā khaṇḍitayā guṇalakṣmyā samāśritaḥ  manomohaharaṃ vākyaṃ vakṣyamāṇamidaṃ śrṛṇu  puṇyakalpadrumo yasya phalabhārānataḥ sthitaḥ  muktaye jāyate jantostasyedaṃ śrotumudyamaḥ  pāvanānāmudārāṇāṃ parabodhaikadāyinām  vacasāṃ bhājanaṃ bhūtyai bhavyo bhavati nādhamaḥ  mokṣopāyābhidhāneyaṃ saṃhitā sārasaṃmitā  triṃśaddve ca sahasrāṇi jñātā nirvāṇadāyinī  dīpe yathā vinidrasya jvalite saṃpravartate  ālokonicchatopyevaṃ nirvāṇamanayā bhavet  svayaṃ jñātā śrutā vāpi bhrāntiśāntyaikasaukhyadā  āprekṣya varṇitā sadyo yathā svargataraṅgiṇī  yathā rajjvāmahibhrāntirvinaśyatyavalokanāt  tathaitatprekṣaṇācchāntimeti saṃsāraduḥkhitā  yuktiyuktārthavākyāni kalpitāni pṛthakpṛthak  dṛṣṭāntasārasūktāni cāsyāṃ prakaraṇāni ṣaṭ  vairāgyākhyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ prathamaṃ parikīrtitam  virāgo vardhate yena sekeneva marau taruḥ  anubandhena sahitaṃ diṣṭatattvanirūpaṇam  sārdhaṃ sahasraṃ granthasya yasminhṛdi vicārite  prakāśācchuddhatodeti maṇāviva sumārjite  mumukṣuvyavahārākhyaṃ tataḥ prakaraṇaṃ kṛtam  sahasramātraṃ granthasya yuktigranthena sundaram  svabhāvo hi mumukṣūṇāṃ narāṇāṃ yatra varṇyate  athotpattiprakaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntākhyāyikāmayam  saptagranthasahasrāṇi vijñānapratipādakam  jāgatī draṣṭṛdṛśyaśrīrahaṃtvamitirūpiṇī  anutpannaivotthiteva yatreti parivarṇyate  yasminśrute jagadidaṃ śrotāntarbudhyatekhilam  sāsmadyuṣmatsavistāraṃ salokākāśaparvatam  piṇḍagrahavinirmuktaṃ nirbhittikamaparvatam  pṛthvyādibhūtarahitaṃ saṃkalpa iva pattanam  svapnopalambhabhāvābhaṃ manorājyavadātatam  gandharvanagaraprakhyamarthaśūnyopalambhanāt  dvicandravibhramābhāsaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāmbuvartanam  nauyānalolaśailābhaṃ satyalābhavivarjitam  cittabhramapiśācābhaṃ nirbījamapi bhāsuram  kathārthapratibhāsābhaṃ vyomamuktāvalīnibham  kaṭakatvaṃ yathā hemni taraṅgatvaṃ yathāmbhasi  yathā nabhasi nīlatvamasadevotthitaṃ sadā  abhittiraṅgarahitamupalabdhimanoharam  svapne vā vyomni vā citramakartṛ cirabhāsuram  avahnireva vahnitvaṃ dhatte citrānalo yathā  dadhātyevaṃ jagacchabdarūpārthamasadātmakam  taraṅgotpalamālābhaṃ dṛṣṭanṛtyamivotthitam  cakracītkārapūrṇasya jalarāśimivodyatam  śīrṇapatraṃ bhraṣṭanaṣṭaṃ grīṣme vanamivārasam  maraṇavyagracittābhaṃ śilāgṛhaguhāspadam  andhakāraguhaikaikanṛttamunmattaceṣṭitam  praśāntājñānanīhāraṃ vijñānaśaradambaram  samutkīrṇamiva stambhe citraṃ bhittāvivoditam  paṅkādivābhiracitaṃ sacetanamacetanam  tataḥ sthitiprakaraṇaṃ caturthaṃ parikalpitam  trīṇi granthasahasrāṇi vyākhyānākhyāyikāmayam  itthaṃ jagadahaṃbhāvarūpasthitimupāgatam  draṣṭṛdṛśyakramaṃ prauḍhamityatra parikīrtitam  daśadiṅmaṇḍalābhogabhāsuroyaṃ jagadbhramaḥ  itthamabhyāgato vṛddhimiti tatrocyate ciram  upaśāntiprakaraṇaṃ tataḥ pañcasahasrakam  pañcamaṃ pāvanaṃ proktaṃ yuktisaṃtatisundaram  idaṃ jagadahaṃ tvaṃ ca sa iti bhrāntirutthitā  itthaṃ saṃśāmyatītyasminkathyate ślokasaṃgrahaiḥ  upaśāntiprakaraṇe śrute śāmyati saṃsṛtiḥ  prabhraṣṭacitraseneva kiṃcillabhyopalambhanā  śatāṃśaśiṣṭā bhavati saṃśāntabhrāntarūpiṇī  anyasaṃkalpacittasthā nagaraśrīrivāsatī  alabhyavastupārśvasthasvapnayuddhacirāravā  śāntasaṃkalpamattābhrabhīṣaṇāśaniśabdavat  vismṛtasvapnasaṃkalpanirmāṇanagaropamā  bhaviṣyannagarodyānaprasūvandhyāmalāṅgikā  tasyā jihvocyamānograkathārthānubhavopamā  anullikhitacitrasya citravyāpteva bhittibhūḥ  parivismaryamāṇārthakalpanānagarīnibhā  sarvartumadanutpannavanaspandāsphuṭākṛtiḥ  bhāvipuṣpavanākāravasantarasarañjanā  antarlīnataraṅgaughasaumyavārisaritsamā  nirvāṇākhyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ tataḥ ṣaṣṭhamudāhṛtam  śiṣṭo granthaḥ parīmāṇaṃ tasya jñānamahārthadaḥ  buddhe tasminbhavecchreyo nirvāṇaṃ śāntakalpanam  acetyacitprakāśātmā vijñānātmā nirāmayaḥ  paramākāśakośācchaḥ śāntasarvabhavabhramaḥ  nirvāpitajagadyātraḥ kṛtakartavyasusthitaḥ  samastajanatārambhavajrastambho nabhonibhaḥ  vinigīrṇayathāsaṃkhyajagajjālātitṛptimān  ākāśībhūtaniḥśeṣarūpālokamanaskṛtiḥ  kāryakāraṇakartṛtvaheyādeyadṛśojjhitaḥ  sadeha iva nirdehaḥ sasaṃsāropyasaṃsṛtiḥ  cinmayo ghanapāṣāṇajaṭharāpīvaropamaḥ  cidādityastapallokānandhakāroparopamam  paraprakāśarūpopi paramāndhyamivāgataḥ  ruddhasaṃsṛtidurlīlaḥ prakṣīṇāśāviṣūcikaḥ  naṣṭāhaṃkāravetālo dehavānakalevaraḥ  kasmiṃścidromakoṭyagre tasyeyamavatiṣṭhate  jagallakṣmīrmahāmeroḥ puṣpe kvacidivālinī  paramāṇau paramāṇau cidākāśaḥ svakoṭare  jagallakṣmīsahasrāṇi dhatte kṛtvātha paśyati  vitatatā hṛdayasya mahāmaterhariharāñjajalakṣaśatairapi  tulanameti na muktimato yataḥ pravitatāsti niruttamavastunaḥ  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  asyāṃ vā cittamātrāyāṃ prabodhaḥ saṃpravartate  bījādiva sato vyuptādavaśyaṃbhāvi satphalam  api pauruṣamādeyaṃ śāstraṃ cedyuktibodhakam  anyattvārṣamapi tyājyaṃ bhāvyaṃ nyāyyaikasevinā  yuktiyuktamupādeyaṃ vacanaṃ bālakādapi  anyattṛṇamiva tyājyamapyuktaṃ padmajanmanā  yosmattātasya kūpoyamiti kaupaṃ pibatyapaḥ  tyaktvā gāṅgaṃ purasthaṃ taṃ ko nāśāstyatirāgiṇam  yathoṣasi pravṛttāyāmālokovaśyameṣyati  asyāṃ vā cittamātrāyāṃ suvivekastathaiṣyati  śrutāyāṃ prājñavadanādbuddhvāntaṃ svayameva ca  śanaiḥśanairvicāreṇa buddhau saṃskāra āgate  pūrvaṃ tāvadudetyantarbhṛśaṃ saṃskṛtavākyatā  śuddhayuktā latevoccairyā sabhāsthānabhūṣaṇam  parā nāgaratodeti mahattvaguṇaśālinī  sā yayā snehamāyānti rājāno amarā api  pūrvāparajñaḥ sarvatra naro bhavati buddhimān  padārthānāṃ yathā dīpahasto niśi sulocanaḥ  lobhamohādayo doṣāstānavaṃ yāntyalaṃ śanaiḥ  dhiyo diśaḥ samāsannaśarado mihikā yathā  kevalaṃ samavekṣyante vivekādhyāsanaṃ dhiyaḥ  na kiṃcana phalaṃ dhatte svābhyāsena vinā kriyā  manaḥ prasādamāyāti śaradīva mahatsaraḥ  paraṃ sāmyamupādatte nirmandara ivārṇavaḥ  nirastakālimāratnaśikhevāstatamaḥpaṭā  prati jvalatyalaṃ prajñā padārthapravibhāginī  dainyadāridryadoṣāḍhyā dṛṣṭayo darśitāntarāḥ  na nikṛntanti marmāṇi sasaṃnāhamiveṣavaḥ  hṛdayaṃ nāvalumpanti bhīmāḥ saṃsṛtibhītayaḥ  puraḥsthitamapi prājñaṃ mahopalamiveṣavaḥ  kathaṃ syādāditā janmakarmaṇāṃ daivapuṃstvayoḥ  ityādisaṃśayagaṇaḥ śāmyatyahni yathā tamaḥ  sarvadā sarvabhāveṣu saṃśāntirupajāyate  yāminyāmiva śāntāyāṃ prajāloka upāgate  samudrasyeva gāmbhīryaṃ dhairyaṃ meroriva sthitam  antaḥ śītalatā cendorivodeti vicāriṇaḥ  sā jīvanmuktatā tasya śanaiḥ pariṇatiṃ gatā  śāntāśeṣaviśeṣasya bhavatyaviṣayo girām  sarvārthaśītalā śuddhā paramālokadāsyadhīḥ  paraṃ prakāśamāyāti jyotsneva śaradaindavī  hṛdyākāśe vivekārke śamālokini nirmale  anarthasārthakartāro nodyanti kila ketavaḥ  śāmyanti śuddhimāyānti saumyāstiṣṭhanti sūnnate  acañcale jaletṛṣṇāḥ śaradīvābhramālikāḥ  yatkiṃcanakarī krūrā grāmyatā vinivartate  dīnānanā piśācānāṃ līleva divasāgame  dharmabhittau bhṛśaṃ lagnāṃ dhiyaṃ dhairyadhuraṃ gatām  ādhayo na vidhunvanti vātāścitralatāmiva  na patatyavaṭe jñastu viṣayāsaṅgarūpiṇi  kaḥ kila jñātasaraṇiḥ śvabhraṃ samanudhāvati  sacchāstrasādhuvṛttānāmavirodhini karmaṇi  ramate dhīryathāprāpte sādhvīvāntaḥpurājire  jagatāṃ koṭilakṣeṣu yāvantaḥ paramāṇavaḥ  teṣāmekaikaśontaḥsthānsargānpaśyatyasaṅgadhīḥ  mokṣopāyāvabodhena śuddhāntaḥkaraṇaṃ janam  na khedayati bhogaugho na cānandayati kvacit  paramāṇau paramāṇau sarvavargā nirargalāḥ  ye patantyutpatantyambuvīcivattānsa paśyati  na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati  kāryāṇyeṣa prabuddhopi niṣprabuddha iva drumaḥ  dṛśyate lokasāmānyo yathāprāptānuvṛttimān  iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaprāptau hṛdayenāparājitaḥ  buddhvedamakhilaṃ śāstraṃ vācayitvā vivicyatām  anubhūyata evaitanna tūktaṃ varaśāpavat  śāstraṃ subodhamevedaṃ sālaṃkāravibhūṣitam  kāvyaṃ rasamayaṃ cāru dṛṣṭāntaiḥ pratipāditam  budhyate svayamevedaṃ kiṃcitpadapadārthavit  svayaṃ yastu na vettīdaṃ śrotavyaṃ tena paṇḍitāt  yasminśrute mate jñāte tapodhyānajapādikam  mokṣaprāptau narasyeha na kiṃcidupayujyate  etacchāstraghanābhyāsātpaunaḥpunyena vīkṣaṇāt  pāṇḍityaṃ syādapūrvaṃ hi cittasaṃskārapūrvakam  ahaṃ jagaditi prauḍho draṣṭṛdṛśyapiśācakaḥ  piśācorkodayeneva svayaṃ śāmyatyayatnataḥ  bhramo jagadahaṃ ceti sthita evopaśāmyati  svapnamohaḥ parijñāta iva no bhramayatyalam  yathā saṃkalpanagare puṃso harṣaviṣāditā  na bādhate tathaivāsminparijñāte jagadbhrame  citrasarpaḥ parijñāto na sarpabhayado yathā  dṛśyasarpaḥ parijñātastathā na sukhaduḥkhadaḥ  parijñānena sarpatvaṃ citrasarpasya naśyati  yathā tathaiva saṃsāraḥ sthita evopaśāmyati  sumanaḥpallavāmarde kiṃcidvyatikaro bhavet  paramārthapadaprāptau natu vyatikarolpakaḥ  gacchatyavayavaḥ spandaṃ sumanaḥpatramardane  iha dhīmātrarodhastu nāṅgāvayavacālanam  sukhāsanopaviṣṭena yathāsaṃbhavamaśnatā  bhogajālaṃ sadācāraviruddheṣu na tiṣṭhatā  yathākṣaṇaṃ yathādeśaṃ pravicārayatā sukham  yathāsaṃbhavasatsaṅgamidaṃ śāstramathetarat  āsādyate mahājñānabodhaḥ saṃsāraśāntidaḥ  na bhūyo jāyate yena yoniyantraprapīḍanam  etāvatyapi yebhītāḥ pāpā bhogarase sthitāḥ  svamātṛviṣṭhākṛmayaḥ kīrtanīyā na tedhamāḥ  śrṛṇu tāvadidānīṃ tvaṃ kathyamānamidaṃ mayā  rāghava jñānavistāraṃ buddhisāratarāntaram  yathedaṃ śrūyate cāstraṃ tāmāpātanikāṃ śrṛṇu  vicāryate yathārthoyaṃ yathā ca paribhāṣayā  yenehānanubhūterthe dṛṣṭenārthena bodhanam  bodhopakāraphaladaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ vidurbudhāḥ  dṛṣṭāntena vinā rāma nāpūrvārthovabudhyate  yathā dīpaṃ vinā rātrau bhāṇḍopaskaraṇaṃ gṛhe  yairyaiḥ kākutstha dṛṣṭāntaistvaṃ mayehāvabodhyase  sarve sakāraṇāste hi prāpyantu sadakāraṇam  upamānopameyānāṃ kāryakāraṇatoditā  varjayitvā paraṃ brahma sarveṣāmeva vidyate  brahmopadeśe dṛṣṭānto yastaveha hi kathyate  ekadeśasadharmatvaṃ tatrāntaḥ parigṛhyate  yo yo nāmeha dṛṣṭānto brahmatattvāvabodhane  dīyate sa sa boddhavyaḥ svapnajāto jagadgataḥ  evaṃ sati nirākāre brahmaṇyākāravānkatham  dṛṣṭānta iti nodyanti mūrkhavaikalpikoktayaḥ  anyāsiddhaviruddhādidṛgdṛṣṭāntapradūṣaṇaiḥ  svapnopamatvājjagataḥ samudeti na kiṃcana  avastu pūrvāparayorvartamāne vicāritam  yathā jāgrattathā svapnaḥ siddhamābālamāgatam  svapnasaṃkalpanādhyānavaraśāpauṣadhādibhiḥ  yathārthā iha dṛṣṭāntāstadrūpatvājjagatsthiteḥ  mokṣopāyakṛtā granthakāreṇānyepi ye kṛtāḥ  granthāsteṣviyamevaikā vyavasthā bodhyabodhane  svapnābhatvaṃ ca jagataḥ śrute śāstrevabodhyate  śīghraṃ na pāryate vaktuṃ vākkila kramavartinī  svapnasaṃkalpanādhyānanagarādyupamaṃ jagat  yatasta eva dṛṣṭāntāstasmātsantīha netare  akāraṇe kāraṇatā yadbodhāyopamīyate  na tatra sarvasādharmyaṃ saṃbhavatyupamāśramaiḥ  upameyasyopamānādekāṃśena sadharmatā  aṅgīkāryāvabodhāya dhīmatā nirvivādinā  arthāvalokane dīpādābhāmātrādṛte kila  na sthānatailavartyādi kiṃcidavyupayujyate  ekadeśasamarthatvādupameyāvabodhanam  upamānaṃ karotyaṅga dīporthaprabhayā yathā  dṛṣṭāntasyāṃśamātreṇa bodhyabodhodaye sati  upādeyatayā grāhyo mahāvākyārthaniścayaḥ  na kutārkikatāmetya nāśanīyā prabuddhatā  anubhūtyapalāpāntairapavitrairvikalpitaiḥ  vicāraṇādanubhavakārivairiṇopi vāṅmayaṃ tvanugatamasmadādiṣu  striyoktamapyapaparamārthavaidikaṃ vaco vacaḥpralapanameva nāgamaḥ  asmākamasti matiraṅga tayeti sarvaśāstraikavākyakaraṇaṃ phalitaṃ yato yaḥ  prātītikārthamapaśāstranijāṅgapuṣṭātsaṃvedanāditaradasti tataḥ pramāṇam  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  viśiṣṭāṃśasamarthatvamupamāneṣu gṛhyate  ko bhedaḥ sarvasādṛśye tūpamānopameyayoḥ  dṛṣṭāntabuddhāvekātmajñānaśāstrārthavedanāt  mahāvākyārthasaṃsiddhā śāntinirvāṇamucyate  tasmāddṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntavikalpollasitairalam  yayā kayācidyuktyā tu mahāvākyārthamāśrayet  śāntiḥ śreyaḥ paraṃ viddhi tatprāptau yatnavānbhava  bhoktavyamodanaṃ prāptaṃ kiṃ tatsiddhau vikalpitaiḥ  akāraṇaiḥ kāraṇibhirbodhārthamupamīyate  upamānaistūpameyaiḥ sadṛśairekadeśataḥ  sthātavyaṃ neha bhogeṣu vivekarahitātmanā  upalodarasaṃjātaparipīnāndhabhekavat  dṛṣṭāntairyatnamāśritya jetavyaṃ parame padam  vicāraṇavatā bhāvyaṃ śāntiśāstrārthaśālinā  śāstropadeśasaujanyaprajñātajjñasamāgamaiḥ  antarāntarasaṃpannadharmārthopārjanakriyaḥ  tāvadvicārayetprājño yāvadviśrāntimātmani  saṃprayātyapunarnāśāṃ śāntiṃ turyapadābhidhām  turyaviśrāntiyuktasya pratīpasya bhavārṇavāt  jīvatojīvataścaiva gṛhasthasya tathā yateḥ  na kṛtenākṛtenārtho na śrutismṛtivibhramaiḥ  nirmandara ivāmbhodhiḥ sa tiṣṭhati yathāsthitam  ekāṃśenopamānānāmupameyasadharmatā  boddhavyaṃ bodhyabodhāya na stheyaṃ bodhacañcunā  yayā kayācidyuktyā tu boddhavyaṃ bodhyameva te  yuktāyuktaṃ na paśyanti vyākulā bodhacañcavaḥ  hṛdaye saṃvidākāśe viśrāntenubhavātmani  vastunyanarthaṃ yaḥ prāha bodhacañcuḥ sa ucyate  abhimānavikalpāṃśairajño jñaptiṃ vikalpayet  bodhaṃ malinayatyantaḥ svaṃ khamabda ivāmalam  sarvapramāṇasattānāṃ padamabdhirapāmiva  pramāṇamekameveha pratyakṣaṃ tadataḥ śṛṇu  sarvākṣasāramadhyakṣaṃ vedanaṃ viduruttamāḥ  nūnaṃ tatpratipatsiddhaṃ tatpratyakṣamudāhṛtam  anubhūtervedanasya pratipatteryathābhidham  pratyakṣamiti nāmeha kṛtaṃ jīvaḥ sa eva naḥ  sa eva saṃvitsa pumānahaṃtāpratyayātmakaḥ  sa yayodeti saṃvittyā sā padārtha iti smṛtā  sasaṃkalpavikalpādyaiḥ kṛtanānākramabhramaiḥ  jagattayā sphuratyambu taraṅgāditayā yathā  prāgakāraṇamevāśu sargādau sargalīlayā  sphuritvā kāraṇaṃ bhūtaṃ pratyakṣaṃ svayamātmani  kāraṇaṃ tvavicārotthajīvasyāsadapi sthitam  sadivāsyāṃ jagadrūpaṃ prakṛtau vyaktimāgatam  svayameva vicārastu svata utthaṃ svakaṃ vapuḥ  nāśayitvā karotyāśu pratyakṣaṃ paramaṃ mahat  vicāravānvicāropi ātmānamavagacchati  yadā tadā nirullekhaṃ paramevāvaśiṣyate  manasyanīhite śānte svabuddhīndriyakarmabhiḥ  nahi kaścitkṛtairartho nākṛtairapyabhāvanāt  manasyanīhite śānte na pravartanta eva te  karmendriyāṇi karmādāvasaṃcāritayantravat  manoyantrasya calane kāraṇaṃ vedanaṃ viduḥ  praṇālīdārumeṣasya rajjurantargatā yathā  rūpālokamanaskārapadārthavyākulaṃ jagat  vidyate vedanasyāntarvātāntaḥ spandanaṃ yathā  sarvātmavedanaṃ śuddhaṃ yathodeti tadātmakam  bhāti prasṛtadikkālabāhyāntārūpadehakam  dṛṣṭvaiva dṛśyatābhāsaṃ svarūpaṃ dhārayansthitaḥ  svaṃ yathā yatra yadrūpaṃ pratibhāti tathaiva tat  sa sarvātmā yathā yatra samullāsamupāgataḥ  tiṣṭhatyāśu tathā tatra tadrūpa iva rājate  sarvātmakatayā draṣṭurdṛśyatvamiva yujyate  dṛśyatvaṃ draṣṭṛsadbhāve dṛśyatāpi na vāstavī  akāraṇakamevāto brahma siddhamidaṃ sthitam  pratyakṣameva nirmātṛ tasyāṃśāstvanumādayaḥ  svayatnamātre yadupāsako yastaddaivaśabdārthamapāsya dūre  śūreṇa sādho padamuttamaṃ tat svapauruṣeṇaiva hi labhyatentaḥ  vicārayācāryaparamparāṇāṃ matena satyena sitena tāvat  yāvadviśuddhaṃ svayameva buddhayā hyanantarūpaṃ paramabhyupaiṣi  śrīvasiṣṭha uvāca  āryasaṃgamayuktyādau prajñāṃ vṛddhiṃ nayedbalāt  tato mahāpuruṣatāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ  yo yo yena guṇeneha puruṣaḥ pravirājate  śiṣyate taṃ tamevāśu tasmādbuddhiṃ vivardhayet  mahāpuruṣatā hyeṣā śamādiguṇaśālinī  samyagjñānaṃ vinā rāma siddhimeti na kāṃcana  jñānācchamādayo yānti vṛddhiṃ satpuruṣakramāḥ  ślāghanīyāḥ phalenāntarvṛṣṭeriva navāṅkurāḥ  śamādibhyo guṇebhyaśca vardhate jñānamuttamam  annātmakebhyo yajñebhyaḥ śālivṛṣṭirivottamā  guṇāḥ śamādayo jñānācchamādibhyastathā jñatā  parasparaṃ vivardhante te abjasarasī iva  jñānaṃ satpuruṣācārājjñānātsatpuruṣakramaḥ  parasparaṃ gatau vṛddhiṃ jñānasatpuruṣakramau  śamaprajñādinipuṇapuruṣārthakrameṇa ca  abhyasetpuruṣo dhīmāñjñānasatpuruṣakramau  na yāvatsamamabhyastau jñānasatpuruṣakramau  ekopi naitayostāta puruṣasyeha sidhyati  yathā kalamarakṣiṇyā gītyā vitatatālayā  khagotsādena sahitaṃ gītānandaḥ prasādhyate  jñānasatpuruṣehābhyāmakartrā kartṛrūpiṇā  tathā puṃsā niricchena samamāsādyate padam  sadācārakramaḥ prokto mayaivaṃ raghunandana  tathopadiśyate samyagevaṃ jñānakramodhunā  idaṃ yaśasyamāyuṣyaṃ puruṣārthaphalapradam  tajjñādāptācca sacchāstraṃ śrotavyaṃ kila dhīmatā  śrutvā tvaṃ buddhinairmalyādbalādyāsyasi tatpadam  yathā katakasaṃśleṣātprasādaṃ kaluṣaṃ payaḥ  viditavedyamidaṃ hi mano munervivaśameva hi yāti paraṃ padam  yadavabuddhamakhaṇḍitamuttamaṃ tadavabodhavaśānna jahāti hi  vāgbhābhirbrahmavidbrahma bhāti svapna ivātmani  yadidaṃtatsvaśabdotthairyo yadvetti sa vetti tat  nyāyenānena lokesminsarge brahmāmbare sati  kimidaṃ kasya kutreti codyamūce nirākṛtam  ahaṃ tāvadyathājñānaṃ yathāvastu yathākramam  yathāsvabhāvaṃ tatsarvaṃ vacmīdaṃ śrūyatāṃ budha  svapnavatpaśyati jagaccinnabhodehavitsvayam  svapnasaṃsāradṛṣṭānta evāhaṃ tvaṃ samanvitam  mumukṣuvyavahāroktimayātprakaraṇātparam  athotpattiprakaraṇaṃ mayedaṃ parikathyate  bandhoyaṃ dṛśyasadbhāvāddṛśyābhāvena bandhanam  na saṃbhavati dṛśyaṃ tu yathedaṃ tacchraṇu kramāt  utpadyate yo jagati sa eva kila vardhate  sa eva mokṣamāpnoti svargaṃ vā narakaṃ ca vā  ataste svāvabodhārthaṃ tattāvatkathayāmyaham  utpattiḥ saṃsṛtāveti pūrvameva hi yo yathā  idaṃ prakaraṇārthaṃ tvaṃ saṃkṣepācchṛṇu rāghava  tataḥ saṃkathayiṣyāmi vistaraṃ te yathepsitam  yadidaṃ dṛśyate sarvaṃ jagatsthāvarajaṃgamam  tatsuṣuptāviva svapnaḥ kalpānte pravinaśyati  tataḥ stimitagambhīraṃ na tejo na tamastatam  anākhyamanabhivyaktaṃ satkiṃcidavaśiṣyate  ṛtamātmā paraṃ brahma satyamityādikā budhaiḥ  kalpitā vyavahārārthaṃ tasya saṃjñā mahātmanaḥ  sa tathābhūta evātmā svayamanya ivollasan  jīvatāmupayātīva bhāvināmnā kadarthitām  tataḥ sa jīvaśabdārthakalanākulatāṃ gataḥ  mano bhavati bhūtātmā mananānmantharībhavan  manaḥ saṃpadyate tena mahataḥ paramātmanaḥ
